name: Grasping Vine
description:
A predatory plant that lies in wait, lashing out with thorny vines to ensnare unsuspecting prey.

Ensnare(Active, Costs 2 HP) Targets one character. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: You are entangled and Immobilized for 2 rounds. On 9-15: You are partially caught and Immobilized for 1 round. On 16+: You completely evade the grasping vine.

name: Rockhide Basilisk
description:
A reptilian predator with a stony hide and a gaze that can turn flesh to rock.

Petrifying Gaze(Active, Costs 4 SP) Targets one character. The player must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: You are Stunned for 2 rounds as your body seizes up. On 9-15: You resist the full effect but are Stunned for 1 round. On 16+: You avert your gaze and are unaffected.

name: Spitfire Imp
description:
A small, mischievous demon that delights in setting things ablaze with fiery saliva.

Fiery Spit(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The target is Burning for 1d4 magical damage for 1 round. On 16+: The target is Burning for 1d4 magical damage for 2 rounds.

name: Shadow Stalker
description:
A creature of living shadow that hunts in darkness, striking from unseen angles.

Shadow Strike(Passive) Deals +1d6 damage when attacking from the shadows or an unseen position.
Fade(Active, Costs 3 SP) Becomes invisible until its next attack.

name: Iron-Golem Sentry
description:
A hulking automaton of iron and brass, built to guard ancient ruins with relentless force.

Slam(Active, Costs 3 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals HD damage. On 16+: The attack deals HD damage and can Push 2 the target.

name: Corrosive Slime
description:
An amorphous ooze that secretes a powerful acid, capable of dissolving armor and weapons.

Corrode(Passive) On a successful melee attack, the target's armor is reduced by 1 for the rest of the encounter.

name: Whispering Spirit
description:
A tormented soul that haunts a specific location, its whispers driving mortals to madness.

Maddening Whispers(Active, Costs 3 SP) Targets one character. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: You are overwhelmed and become Confused for 2 rounds. On 9-15: You are shaken and become Confused for 1 round. On 16+: You steel your mind against the whispers.

name: Cave-in Spider
description:
A large arachnid that creates unstable tunnels, collapsing them on prey to trap and consume them.

Web Trap(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll. On 1-8: The web is flimsy and has no effect. On 9-15: Creates a 2x2 area of difficult terrain for 1 round within 5 squares. On 16+: Creates a 2x2 area of difficult terrain within 5 squares until it is cleared.

name: Thunder Roc
description:
A massive bird of prey whose wings crackle with storm energy.

Thunderclap(Active, Costs 3 MP) All characters within 3 squares must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: You are Deafened for 2 rounds and Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: You are Deafened for 1 round. On 16+: You brace for the impact and are unaffected.

name: Dire Wolf Alpha
description:
A massive, battle-scarred wolf that leads its pack with cunning and ferocity.

Pack Tactics(Passive) Gains +2 forward when an ally is adjacent to its target.
Howl of the Alpha(Active, Costs 2 SP) All allied creatures within 5 squares gain +2 forward to their next attack.

name: Orphaned Cub
description:
This small, bipedal creature wears the bleached skull of a much larger animal as a helmet, its sad, lonely eyes peering out from the sockets. It carries a heavy femur bone, which it wields as a surprisingly effective club.

Bone Club(Active, Costs 1 HP) A melee attack that deals HD+2 physical damage.
Lonely Rage(Passive) While below half HP, this creature's HD attacks deal +1d6 damage.

name: Lulling Puffball
description:
A perfectly round, pink, balloon-like creature with large, innocent blue eyes and small, pointed ears. It's incredibly light and floats slightly above the ground, humming a soft, melodious tune.

Sing(Active, Costs 4 SP) All characters within a 3-square radius must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: You fall into a deep sleep, becoming Stunned until you take damage. On 9-15: You feel drowsy and are Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: You resist the lullaby.
Pound(Active, Costs 1 HP) A weak melee attack that deals HD-2 physical damage.

name: Blight Orb
description:
A levitating sphere of thin, purple membrane filled with a churning, noxious gas. A crude, grinning face is plastered on its front, and it constantly leaks a foul-smelling vapor from various pores on its body.

Poison Gas(Active, Costs 3 MP) Make a roll. On 1-8: All adjacent characters are Poisoned for 1d4 MD for 1 round. On 9-15: All adjacent characters are Poisoned for 1d4 MD for 2 rounds. On 16+: All adjacent characters are Poisoned for 1d4 MD for 2 rounds and are Weakened for 1 round.
Smokescreen(Active, Costs 2 MP) Creates a 3x3 area of smoke centered on itself that heavily obscures vision.

name: Blade-Wing Mantis
description:
A humanoid insectoid creature with a green, armored exoskeleton and a raptor-like head. Its forearms have evolved into a pair of enormous, bone-white scythes. Small, transparent wings on its back buzz furiously, allowing it to move with blinding speed.

Slash(Active, Costs 1 HP) Melee attack that deals HD+3 physical damage.
Agility(Active, Costs 2 HP) This creature can take two Move actions on its next turn.

name: Lodestone Sprite
description:
A levitating metal sphere with a single, unblinking red eye at its center. Two large horseshoe magnets are fixed to its sides, emitting a low hum and crackling with blue electricity. It communicates in a series of metallic beeps.

Thunder Shock(Active, Costs 2 MP) Ranged attack (6 squares). Deals MD lightning damage.
Magnet Pull(Active, Costs 3 MP) Target wearing metal armor within 5 squares must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: You are Pulled 3 squares. On 9-15: You are Pulled 2 squares. On 16+: You hold your ground.

name: Dermal Slug
description:
A stout, pink salamander-like creature with a perpetually vacant stare and a long, curled tail. It moves at a glacial pace, seemingly lost in thought. Its rubbery hide is remarkably thick and absorbs impacts easily.

Amnesia(Reaction, Costs 2 SP) When it takes damage, it can use its reaction to heal for 1d6 HP.
Thick Skin(Passive) All HD damage it takes is reduced by 1.

name: Phase Cat
description:
A small, golden-furred feline with a long, elegant tail and closed eyes. It appears to be perpetually sleeping, but its mind is alert, and it will instinctively teleport away from any perceived threat.

Teleport(Reaction, Costs 3 MP) When targeted by an attack, it can use its reaction to teleport to any empty square within 4 squares, causing the attack to miss.
Psybeam(Active, Costs 2 MP) Ranged attack (6 squares) that deals MD magical damage.

name: Whack-a-Gnoll
description:
The only part of this creature ever seen is its brown, furry head, which has a large pink nose and simple black eyes. It lives entirely underground, popping up from holes in the earth to strike before vanishing again.

Submerge(Active, Costs 1 HP) The creature becomes untargetable until the start of its next turn.
Surprise Attack(Active, while submerged) Deals HD+2 physical damage to an adjacent target.

name: Mimic Slime
description:
A formless, gelatinous blob of purple ooze with two tiny black dots for eyes and a simple line for a mouth. Its cellular structure is unstable, allowing it to perfectly replicate the form and abilities of another creature.

Transform(Active, Costs 5 MP) Targets one creature within 3 squares. Make a roll. On 1-8: The transformation fails. On 9-15: The Mimic Slime copies the target's stats, abilities, and features for 2 rounds. Its HP remains the same. On 16+: The transformation is perfect, lasting for 3 rounds.

name: Ragged Imposter
description:
This creature hides its true form beneath a crudely sewn costume of a small, beloved animal. It has two holes for its glowing eyes and a jaggedly drawn smile. It seems to desperately want affection, but its attacks are vicious.

Disguise(Passive) The first time this creature takes damage, it takes 0 damage instead, but its disguise is broken. While its disguise is broken, it becomes Frightened.
Shadow Claw(Active, Costs 2 SP) Melee attack that deals HD+SD magical shadow damage.

name: Gravebloom Walker
description:
This is a humanoid corpse in an advanced state of decay, but with a strange, beautiful horror to it. Pale, bioluminescent mushrooms sprout from its joints and eye sockets, pulsing with a sickly green light. A network of dark-purple vines and roots wraps around its limbs, acting as a crude nervous system that pulls the body forward.

Spore Cloud(Active, Costs 2 MP) Releases a cloud of spores in a 2-square radius. All characters within the cloud must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: You are Weakened for 2 rounds. On 9-15: You are Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: You are unaffected.
Gravebloom Burst(Passive) When this creature is defeated, it explodes. All adjacent characters must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-15 they are Poisoned for 1d4 MD for 1 round. On 16+ they are unaffected.

name: Bone Chime
description:
This creature is an elegant, almost artistic skeleton composed of polished, ivory-white bones that are covered in faintly glowing blue runes. Its ribcage is arranged like a macabre xylophone, and its movements create a series of soft, melodic clicks. It carries a bow carved from a giant's femur that hums with spectral energy.

Resonant Shot(Active, Costs 2 MP) Ranged attack (10 squares) that deals MD magical damage.
Shattering Note(Active, Costs 3 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack. On 1-8: The arrow misses. On 9-15: The target's armor is reduced by 1 for the encounter. On 16+: The target's armor is reduced by 2 for the encounter.

name: Sorrowful Effigy
description:
This appears as a life-sized, exquisitely crafted porcelain doll, dressed in a tattered but once-beautiful gown. Its painted face is cracked, and a thick, black, viscous tear perpetually streams from one of its glass eyes. It floats silently with its head bowed, radiating a palpable aura of deep, soul-crushing sadness.

Aura of Grief(Passive) Any character that ends their turn within 2 squares of the Effigy takes 1d4 SD.
Heartbreak Gaze(Active, Costs 4 SP) Targets one character within 4 squares. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: You are overcome with sorrow and Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: You are shaken and Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: You find the strength to look away.

name: Scrap Scrabbler
description:
A small, hunched creature animated by a greedy spirit. Its body is a chaotic amalgamation of rusted gears, tarnished jewelry, broken pottery, and other grave goods, all held together by swirling spectral energy. It scurries on four mismatched limbs, its eyes glowing like two polished gold coins.

Pilfer(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a melee attack roll. On 1-8: The creature fails to grab anything. On 9-15: It steals one random consumable item from the target. On 16+: It steals one random item of the GM's choice from the target.
Scrabbling Claws(Active, Costs 1 HP) Melee attack that deals HD-2 damage but hits twice.

name: Soul Lantern
description:
This creature is the tiny, desiccated skeleton of a gnome, wrapped in tattered black robes. It doesn't walk, but floats ominously. In its frail hands, it clutches a large, ornate brass lantern. Inside, a single, baleful purple flame flickers with intelligent light‚Äîthis is the Lich's true form and the source of its power.

Soulflame Bolt(Active, Costs 3 MP) Ranged attack (8 squares) that deals MD magical damage.
Fragile Phylactery(Passive) The Soul Lantern can be targeted by attacks. If the lantern is destroyed, the creature is instantly defeated.

name: Marionette Husk
description:
This appears to be a recently deceased person, but its skin is unnaturally pale and its eyes are a milky white. Faint, shimmering crimson threads of energy extend from its wrists, ankles, and neck, leading upwards into the shadows. Its movements are sharp, jerky, and puppet-like, controlled by an unseen master.

Puppet Dance(Passive) Cannot be Slowed or Immobilized.
Sanguine Lash(Active, Costs 1 HP) Melee attack with Reach (2 squares) that deals HD damage.

name: Rust Knight
description:
A massive, ancient suit of plate armor, so corroded that it's more orange than silver. Thick clumps of moss and small, pale vines cling to its joints. It moves with a slow, grinding inevitability, and a faint green light emanates from within its helmet. It carries no weapon, for its armored fists are weapons enough.

Battle Stance(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Knight forgoes its movement to gain +2 Armor until its next turn.
Memory of the Blade(Passive) This creature's HD increases by +1 each round it remains in combat.

name: Tombstone Amalgam
description:
A lumbering, vaguely humanoid horror composed of materials from a desecrated graveyard. Its torso is a large, cracked tombstone, its limbs are tangles of rusted iron fence and thorny roots, and its form is studded with embedded skulls and bones. It drags a heavy length of broken mausoleum chain from one arm.

Hurl Debris(Active, Costs 1d4 HP) Ranged attack (4 squares). Deals x2HD physical damage.
Grave Grasp(Active, Costs 3 HP) A skeletal hand erupts under a target within 5 squares. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: You are Immobilized for 2 rounds. On 9-15: You are Immobilized for 1 round. On 16+: You leap away from the hand.

name: Gilded Sentinel
description:
This mummy is not wrapped in coarse linen, but in intricate, golden-yellow silk ribbons that leave parts of its desiccated, dark skin exposed. It wears a polished golden funerary mask depicting a serene face, and pieces of its own ornate sarcophagus are attached to its back and shoulders like heavy, protective pauldrons.

Curse of the Tomb(Passive) Any character hit by this creature's melee attack becomes Weakened for 1 round.
Sarcophagus Shield(Active, Costs 2 HP) Gains +4 Armor until its next turn, but its speed becomes 0.

name: Echo of Despair
description:
A flickering, translucent figure that is difficult to focus on. It constantly shifts its appearance, one moment a child crying for its parents, the next an old soldier dying alone on a battlefield. It never attacks physically, but its touch drains hope and willpower, leaving its victims cold and empty.

Draining Touch(Active, Costs 3 SP) Make a melee attack roll. On 1-8: The touch misses. On 9-15: Deals SD damage to the target. On 16+: Deals SD damage and the target loses 1d4 MP.
Incorporeal(Passive) Takes half damage from non-magical physical sources (HD). Can move through other creatures and objects.

name: Emberdrake Hatchling
description:
Roughly the size of a large wolf, this young dragon is covered in vibrant, ruby-red scales that glow with a faint, pulsing heat, like embers in a forge.

Fiery Breath(Active, Costs 4 MP) Deals MD to all targets in a 3-square cone. Players must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: Take full MD and are Burning for 1d4 damage for 2 rounds. On 9-15: Take half MD and are Burning for 1d4 damage for 1 round. On 16+: You dodge the flames.

name: Hoarfrost Wyrm
description:
A long, serpentine dragon with a body made of interlocking plates of jagged, pale-blue ice. It has no legs, slithering across the ground with an eerie grace, leaving a trail of frost in its wake.

Freezing Aura(Passive) Enemies that start their turn within 2 squares of the Wyrm are Slowed for 1 round.
Glacial Shards(Active, Costs 3 MP) Ranged attack (6 squares) that deals MD as cold damage.

name: Sagebrush Drake
description:
This wingless drake has a powerful, low-slung body covered in thick, sandstone-colored scales that perfectly camouflage it in arid environments.

Burrow(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Drake burrows underground, becoming untargetable. It can move at its normal speed and must resurface at the start of its next turn.
Earthen Spike(Active, while burrowed, Costs 1 HP) Deals HD+2 physical damage to a target from below.

name: Mind-Twisting Wyvern
description:
A slender, two-legged wyvern with iridescent purple scales that seem to shift in color. Instead of leathery membranes, its vast wings are covered in soft, owl-like feathers that allow for silent flight.

Psychic Assault(Active, Costs 4 SP) Ranged attack (7 squares). The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: You take full SD damage and are Frightened for 2 rounds. On 9-15: You take half SD damage and are Frightened for 1 round. On 16+: You resist the psychic assault.

name: Verdant Elder Dragon
description:
This immense, ancient dragon moves with the slow, deliberate certainty of a shifting forest. Its scales are like the gnarled bark of an old oak, covered in patches of moss and symbiotic fungi.

Poison Spores(Active, Costs 4 MP) Deals MD to all characters in a 3-square cone. Players must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: Take full MD and are Poisoned for 1d6 damage for 2 rounds. On 9-15: Take half MD and are Poisoned for 1d6 damage for 1 round. On 16+: You resist the spores.
Regeneration(Passive) Heals for 1d6 HP at the start of its turn.

name: Stormwing Amphithere
description:
A legless, serpentine dragon with a long, coiling body covered in iridescent scales that shimmer like oil on water. Its head is slender and elegant, with a crest of storm-grey feathers.

Chain Lightning(Active, Costs 5 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (8 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: Deals MD magical damage to the primary target. On 16+: Deals MD magical damage to the primary target, then arcs to one other enemy within 3 squares for half MD.

name: Sunken Hydra
description:
A monstrous beast of the deeps. Its colossal, dark green body is mostly submerged, with a finned ridge running along its spine.

Multi-Headed Attack(Passive) This creature starts with 3 heads. It can make one melee attack per head on its turn. For every 15 HP lost, it loses a head.
Regenerate Head(Active, Costs 5 HP) If it has lost a head, it can spend its action to regrow one.

name: Obsidian Ravager
description:
A heavily-built, powerful dragon whose entire body is covered in interlocking plates of jet-black, razor-sharp obsidian.

Obsidian Scales(Passive) When hit by a melee attack, the attacker takes 1d4 HD damage.
Magma Breath(Active, Costs 6 MP) Deals x2MD fire damage in a 4-square line. The area becomes difficult terrain. Players in the line must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: take full damage. On 9-15: take half damage. On 16+: take no damage.

name: Celestial Dragon
description:
This majestic being is less a physical creature and more a constellation given form. Its body is a deep, starry indigo, with points of light that mimic star charts shifting across its scales.

Searing Light(Active, Costs 6 MP) Deals MD+2 holy damage to all enemies in a 4-square cone. Players must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: Take full damage. Undead and Demons are also Blinded for 2 rounds. On 9-15: Take half damage. Undead and Demons are also Blinded for 1 round. On 16+: Take no damage.

name: Plague-Drake
description:
A grotesque, wingless dragon with a massively bloated, pale-green underbelly. Its back is covered in cracked, brown scales from which ooze a foul-smelling black ichor.

Plague Breath(Active, Costs 4 MP) Deals MD disease damage to all targets in a 3-square cone. Players must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: Take full damage and become Weakened for 2 rounds. On 9-15: Take half damage and become Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: Take no damage.

name: Kicking Master
description:
A humanoid creature with a hard, shell-like head and powerful, spring-like legs wrapped in thick white bindings, constantly poised in a kicking stance.

High Jump Kick(Active, Costs 3 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses, and the Kicking Master takes half the damage it would have dealt. On 9-15: The attack hits for x2HD damage. On 16+: The attack is a critical hit for x2HD damage and knocks the target prone.
Triple Kick(Active, Costs 2 HP) Makes three consecutive melee attacks against the same target, each dealing HD-2 damage.

name: Psion Adept
description:
A graceful, lavender-skinned humanoid with an oversized cranium and a glowing purple crystal that floats just before its closed eyes.

Psybeam(Active, Costs 4 MP) Ranged attack (7 squares). The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: You take full MD magical damage and are Confused for 1 round. On 9-15: You take full MD magical damage. On 16+: You take half MD magical damage.
Barrier(Active, Costs 3 MP) Gains +3 Armor until its next turn.

name: Silent Pantomime
description:
A floppy, jester-like humanoid with a static white mask for a face, who moves with unsettling silence as it interacts with invisible objects.

Mimic(Reaction, Costs 4 SP) When an enemy within sight uses an Action, the Pantomime can use its reaction to copy that Action on its next turn.
Invisible Wall(Active, Costs 2 SP) Creates a 1x3 line of impassable, invisible terrain for 1 round within 3 squares.

name: Aura Guardian
description:
A noble, bipedal canine humanoid with sleek blue and black fur, whose spiritually-aware eyes and the metallic spikes on its hands radiate a calm power.

Aura Sphere(Active, Costs 4 MP) Ranged attack (6 squares) that deals MD magical damage and cannot miss.
Detect(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Guardian learns the current HP and MP of one target, and its next attack against them has advantage.

name: Judo Master
description:
A powerfully-built humanoid with tough, reddish-brown, bark-like skin, wearing a tattered white gi and a black belt, perpetually fixed in a low, immovable stance.

Seismic Toss(Active, Costs 3 HP) Melee attack that deals HD damage. If it hits, the player must Defy Danger (STR); on a 1-15, they are moved to any adjacent empty square of the Master's choice.
Circle Throw(Reaction, Costs 2 HP) When missed by a melee attack, the attacker must Defy Danger (DEX); on a 1-15, they are moved 2 squares in a direction of the Master's choice.

name: Blade Prince
description:
An elegant, white-bodied fey humanoid whose arms, from the elbow down, are long, sharp, green blades, and whose head is adorned with a helmet-like crest.

Psycho Cut(Active, Costs 2 HP) Melee attack that deals HD+2 damage and has an increased chance to be a critical hit.
Swords Dance(Active, Costs 4 SP) For the next 2 rounds, this creature's HD attacks deal +1d6 damage.

name: Whirling Dervish
description:
A bizarre humanoid whose lower body is a perpetually spinning top, balancing on a single point while its brown, segmented torso and outstretched arms maintain perfect equilibrium.

Rapid Spin(Active, Costs 3 HP) Deals HD-2 damage to all adjacent enemies and removes any Slowed or Immobilized conditions from itself.
Triple Kick(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a single melee attack roll. On a 9+, it hits for HD damage and can immediately make another attack roll.

name: Gem-Eyed Gremlin
description:
A goblin-sized humanoid made of solidified purple shadow, whose only facial features are two enormous, glowing gemstones that serve as its greedy eyes.

Shadow Claw(Active, Costs 2 SP) Melee attack that deals HD magical damage.
Cursed Body(Passive) The first time this creature would be affected by a condition each scene, the effect is negated.

name: Bladed Automaton
description:
A humanoid construct forged entirely from overlapping, razor-sharp blades of dark metal, with a large axe-like crest on its helmet and massive scissor-claws for hands.

Metal Burst(Active, Costs 4 HP) Ranged attack (4 squares). All creatures in a 2-square line must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: take full HD physical damage. On 9-15: take half HD physical damage. On 16+: take no damage.
Defiant(Passive) When this creature is hit by a melee attack, its next HD attack deals +2 damage.

name: Nocturnal Hunter
description:
A lean humanoid with the head of a vicious bat, covered in short, dark fur and possessing large, leathery wings it keeps folded like a cloak.

Supersonic(Active, Costs 3 SP) Ranged attack (6 squares). The player must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: You take full SD damage and are Confused for 1 round. On 9-15: You take full SD damage. On 16+: You take half SD damage.
Wing Attack(Active, Costs 1 HP) Melee attack that deals HD damage and can Push 1 the target.

name: Myco Brawler
description:
A humanoid fungus with a large, red-and-white mushroom cap for a head and two smaller mushrooms for fists, standing in a boxer's stance.

Spore(Active, Costs 2 MP) Releases spores at one target within 3 squares. The player must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: You fall asleep, becoming Stunned until you take damage. On 9-15: You feel drowsy and become Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: You resist the spores.
Mach Punch(Active, Costs 1 HP) A quick melee attack that deals HD damage; this creature may move 2 squares before or after this attack.

name: Thorned Sentinel
description:
An elegant humanoid made of woven green vines, with a blooming red rose for a head and thorns covering its arms.

Petal Dance(Active, Costs 4 MP) Make a roll. On 1-8: Deals MD to all creatures in a 1-square radius. On 9-15: Deals MD to all creatures in a 2-square radius. On 16+: Deals MD+2 to all creatures in a 2-square radius. After using this ability, the Sentinel becomes Confused for 1 round.
Synthesis(Active, Costs 3 MP) Heals for 1d8 HP, or x2MD HP if in direct sunlight.

name: Oracle Avian
description:
A stout, round, green-feathered avian humanoid with stubby wings and large, unblinking, ring-patterned eyes that seem to stare into the future.

Future Sight(Active, Costs 6 MP) Choose a square within 8 squares. Make a roll. On 1-8: At the start of the creature's next turn, any creature in that square takes 1d8 magical damage. On 9-15: At the start of this creature's next turn, that square explodes, dealing x2MD magical damage to any creature in it. On 16+: The effect from 9-15 occurs, but in a 2x2 area.
Air Slash(Active, Costs 2 MP) Ranged attack (7 squares) that deals MD magical damage.

name: Swamp Brute
description:
A powerfully built, bipedal amphibian with smooth blue skin, a wide frog-like head, and bright orange sacs protruding from its joints.

Mud Shot(Active, Costs 2 MP) Ranged attack (6 squares) that deals MD damage. If it hits, the target must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: You are Slowed for 2 rounds. On 9-15: You are Slowed for 1 round. On 16+: You are not slowed.
Damp(Passive) This creature cannot be affected by the Burning condition.

name: Umbral Pugilist
description:
A small, child-like humanoid made of wispy grey smoke, with a spherical head, a shadowy helmet, and two glowing green embers for eyes.

Shadow Sneak(Active, Costs 2 SP) Melee attack that deals HD damage; this creature may move 2 squares immediately after the attack, before any reaction.
Spectral Thief(Active, Costs 3 SP) Melee attack that deals HD damage. If the target has any temporary HP, this creature steals it.

name: Furnace Belly
description:
A stout, tortoise-like humanoid made of dark volcanic rock, with an iron grate on its belly revealing a roaring fire within.

Shell Trap(Passive) When hit by a melee attack, the attacker takes 1d6 MD fire damage.
White Smoke(Passive) This creature cannot be affected by the Weakened condition.

name: Sandmound Apparition
description:
A shambling, vaguely humanoid mound of cursed sand with two dark pits for eyes and a rusty shovel stuck handle-first in its head.

Sand Tomb(Active, Costs 3 MP) Ranged attack (4 squares). The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: You take full MD damage and are Immobilized for 2 rounds. On 9-15: You take full MD damage and are Immobilized for 1 round. On 16+: You take half damage and are not immobilized.
Water Compaction(Passive) This creature takes double damage from all water-based MD attacks.

name: Vengeful Marionette
description:
A discarded wooden puppet the size of a child, animated by a vengeful spirit and featuring a large brass zipper where its mouth should be.

Curse(Active, Costs 5 SP) Target character must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: You are cursed and have disadvantage on all attack rolls for 2 rounds. On 9-15: You are hexed and have disadvantage on your next attack roll. On 16+: You shrug off the curse.
Frisk(Passive) At the start of combat, it learns if any character is carrying a magical item.

name: Ax-Crest Executioner
description:
A figure clad in articulated, blade-covered steel armor, with a massive axe-blade cresting its helmet and scissor-like claws for hands.

Guillotine Press(Active, Costs 4 HP) Melee attack that deals x2HD damage but has disadvantage on the attack roll.
Iron Head(Active, Costs 1 HP) Melee attack that deals HD+2 damage.

name: Bamboo Blade
description:
An impossibly thin humanoid creature whose body resembles a single, pale green stalk of bamboo, wielding a single, razor-sharp leaf as a sword.

Leaf Blade(Active, Costs 2 HP) Melee attack that is a guaranteed critical hit on a 9+.
Paper Thin(Passive) This creature takes double damage from all fire-based MD attacks.

name: Goblin Sapper
description:
A goblin with singed eyebrows and soot-stained goggles, carrying a heavy sack of clanking, unstable bombs.

Unstable Bomb(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll to throw a bomb at a target square within 5 squares. On 1-8: The bomb fumbles and lands at the Sapper's feet, dealing MD to it and all adjacent creatures. On 9-15: The bomb hits, dealing MD in a 2-square radius. On 16+: The bomb hits, dealing MD in a 3-square radius and all targets are Burning for 1d4 damage for 1 round.

name: Goblin Scavenger
description:
A scrawny goblin with darting eyes and twitchy fingers, carrying a large, overflowing sack of stolen junk.

Pilfer(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Scavenger targets a character for theft. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: A random consumable item is stolen from the player's inventory. On 9-15: An item is stolen, but the Scavenger is revealed and cannot use this ability again this combat. On 16+: The attempt is thwarted.

name: Goblin Shaman
description:
A goblin adorned with bones and sparking rocks, channeling raw, chaotic elemental magic.

Janky Totem(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to place a totem in an adjacent square. On 1-8: The totem backfires, dealing 1d4 MD to the Shaman. On 9-15: The totem zaps the nearest enemy for MD damage at the start of the Shaman's next turn, then crumbles. On 16+: The totem lasts for 2 rounds, zapping the nearest enemy for MD each turn.

name: Goblin Bruiser
description:
An unusually large and muscular goblin with a crude iron helmet and a spiked club, seemingly too dumb to feel pain.

Hefty Swing(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Bruiser targets a character with a powerful swing. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character is hit and takes x2HD damage. On 9-15: The character takes a glancing blow and takes HD damage. On 16+: The character dodges the attack completely.
Dumb Luck(Passive) The first time this creature would take critical damage, it is treated as a normal hit instead.

name: Goblin Net-Trapper
description:
A wiry goblin draped in ropes and nets, its grin revealing several missing teeth as it readies its weighted bolas.

Weighted Net(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Trapper throws a net at a target within 4 squares. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character is caught and becomes Immobilized for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character is partially caught and becomes Slowed for 2 rounds. On 16+: The character avoids the net entirely.

name: Goblin Alchemist
description:
A goblin in a stained leather apron, juggling a collection of fizzing, bubbling, and suspiciously glowing glass vials.

Mystery Concoction(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to throw a potion at a target within 5 squares. On 1-8: The potion is a dud and creates a harmless puff of smoke. On 9-15: The potion shatters, dealing MD acid damage to the target. On 16+: The potion explodes, dealing MD acid damage and the target is Poisoned for 1d4 damage for 1 round.

name: Goblin Stabber
description:
A classic goblin sneaker in dark, ragged leathers, wielding two rusty daggers with an unnerving, wide-eyed glee.

Shiv from the Shadows(Passive) This creature's first attack from a hidden or unseen position deals +HD damage.
Ankle Shank(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Stabber targets a character's legs. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character takes HD damage and is Slowed for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character takes HD damage but is not slowed. On 16+: The character avoids the attack completely.

name: Goblin Taskmaster
description:
A fat, snarling goblin with a cracking whip in one hand and a signaling horn in the other, constantly shouting orders at its underlings.

Get Em!(Active, Costs 2 SP) Make a roll to command other goblins. On 1-8: The command is confusing; one allied goblin becomes Weakened for 1 round. On 9-15: One allied goblin within 5 squares may immediately use its reaction to make a free attack. On 16+: Up to two allied goblins within 5 squares may immediately use their reaction to make a free attack.

name: Goblin Tinkerer
description:
A goblin with oil-stained hands and magnifying goggles, constantly fiddling with a bizarre, whirring clockwork contraption.

Deploy Contraption(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll to deploy a device. On 1-8: The contraption immediately explodes, dealing 1d6 MD to the Tinkerer and all adjacent creatures. On 9-15: It deploys a 'Claw-on-a-Stick', which makes one free melee attack for HD damage then breaks. On 16+: It deploys a 'Mini-Turret' that lasts for 2 rounds and makes a free ranged attack for HD damage each turn.

name: Goblin Under-Boss
description:
A taller, more cunning goblin wearing a stolen captain's hat and a polished shortsword, directing the rabble with a sneer.

You First!(Active, Costs 2 SP) When targeted by an attack, the Under-Boss can use its reaction to redirect it. The attacker must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The attack is redirected to an adjacent allied goblin. On 9-15: The attack hits the Under-Boss, but it redirects half the damage to an adjacent allied goblin. On 16+: The feint fails, and the attack deals +2 damage to the Under-Boss.

name: Orc Grunt
description:
A stocky, green-skinned warrior in simple iron plate armor, hefting a large, single-bladed axe with a grunt.

Cleave(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll to attack a target and an adjacent enemy. On 1-8: The attack misses completely and the Grunt is Weakened for 1 round. On 9-15: The attack hits the primary target for HD damage. On 16+: The attack hits the primary target for HD damage and the adjacent enemy for half HD damage.

name: Orc Berserker
description:
A bare-chested orc covered in white war paint and ritual scars, wielding two notched axes with a wild, bloodthirsty look in its eyes.

Reckless Strike(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Berserker makes a melee attack that deals HD+3 damage, but the next attack against it has advantage.
Enrage(Passive) While below half HP, all of this creature's HD attacks deal +2 damage.

name: Orc Headhunter
description:
A lean, wiry orc with a tall mohawk and sharpened tusks, carrying a bundle of javelins tipped with a sickly green substance.

Poisoned Javelin(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Headhunter throws a javelin at a target within 7 squares. The player must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and is Poisoned for 1d6 MD for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage and is Poisoned for 1d4 MD for 1 round. On 16+: The target takes HD damage but resists the poison.

name: Orc Shaman
description:
An old, wizened orc draped in wolf pelts and adorned with totemic fetishes, its hands crackling with faint blue lightning.

Lightning Bolt(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (8 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals MD magical damage. On 16+: The attack deals MD magical damage and arcs to one adjacent enemy for half MD.

name: Orc Warlock
description:
An orc with sickly grey-green skin and glowing fel-green eyes, clad in dark, spike-adorned robes and clutching a smoldering skull.

Drain Life(Active, Costs 3 MP) The Warlock drains life from a target within 6 squares. The player must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: The target takes MD magical damage, and the Warlock heals for the same amount. On 9-15: The target takes half MD damage, and the Warlock heals for that amount. On 16+: The target takes half MD damage but the Warlock does not heal.

name: Orc Blademaster
description:
A disciplined orc with a long top-knot, wearing samurai-like armor and wielding a single, masterfully crafted longblade with impossible grace.

Wind Walk(Active, Costs 2 SP) Make a roll to turn invisible. On 1-8: The Blademaster becomes translucent for 1 round; attacks against it have disadvantage. On 9-15: The Blademaster becomes Invisible for 1 round. On 16+: The Blademaster becomes Invisible for 2 rounds, and its next attack deals +HD damage.

name: Orc Raider
description:
A ferocious orc warrior in hide and leather armor, mounted on a massive, snarling dire wolf and brandishing a hooked polearm.

Snag(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Raider targets a character within 2 squares. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The character is pulled from their feet and knocked prone. On 9-15: The character is pulled 1 square but keeps their footing. On 16+: The character stands firm and is unaffected.
Pack Tactics(Passive) This creature deals +2 damage to any target that is adjacent to another allied Orc or Wolf.

name: Orc Peon
description:
A downtrodden, stoop-shouldered orc in simple rags, whose eyes dart around nervously as it wields a heavy mining pickaxe.

Desperate Swing(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The Peon misses and stumbles, becoming Weakened for 1 round. On 9-15: The attack hits for HD damage. On 16+: The attack hits for x2HD damage.

name: Orc Warboss
description:
A colossal, battle-scarred orc in massive black plate armor adorned with spikes and skulls, wielding a two-handed axe that seems impossibly large.

Commanding Shout(Active, Costs 3 SP) Make a roll to inspire allies. On 1-8: The shout is uninspiring. On 9-15: All allied Orcs within 5 squares gain +2 damage on their next attack. On 16+: All allied Orcs within 5 squares gain +2 damage on their attacks for 2 rounds.
Shockwave(Active, Costs 3 HP) The Warboss stomps, targeting all characters on the ground in a 4-square cone. Targeted players must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: They are knocked prone and take HD damage. On 9-15: They take HD damage but are not knocked prone. On 16+: They take no damage.

name: Orc Demolitionist
description:
A goblin-like orc with a manic grin and blast goggles, carrying a backpack overflowing with fizzing sticks of dynamite.

Dynamite Toss(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll to throw dynamite at a target square within 6 squares. On 1-8: The dynamite lands 1d4 squares away in a random direction. On 9-15: It hits the target square, dealing MD to all creatures within a 2-square radius. On 16+: It hits the target square, dealing MD to all creatures within a 3-square radius.
Final Blast(Passive) When this creature is defeated, it explodes, dealing MD to all creatures within a 2-square radius.

name: Elven Longbowman
description:
A lithe elf with keen, hawk-like eyes and braided silver hair, clad in green and brown leathers and carrying a masterfully crafted yew longbow.

Aimed Shot(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (12 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals HD+2 damage. On 16+: The attack deals x2HD damage and ignores 1 point of Armor.

name: Elven Spellblade
description:
An elf in ornate, flowing silver mail, whose left hand crackles with arcane energy while the right wields a graceful, rune-etched saber.

Arcane Strike(Active, Costs 2 MP) The Spellblade attacks a character in melee. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character takes HD and MD damage. On 9-15: The character takes HD damage. On 16+: The character dodges the attack completely.

name: Elven Stargazer
description:
A serene elf in deep indigo robes embroidered with silver constellations, whose eyes are pure white pools that seem to reflect a starry night sky.

Portent(Active, Costs 3 SP) The Stargazer targets a character within 8 squares. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The target has disadvantage on their next roll. On 9-15: The target must re-roll their next successful roll and take the second result. On 16+: The player resists the vision.

name: Elven Shadowdancer
description:
A pale, dark-haired elf in form-fitting black leathers, moving with a silent, fluid grace and wielding two wicked-looking, curved daggers.

Shadow Step(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Shadowdancer teleports to a square adjacent to a target within 6 squares and makes a melee attack. Make a roll. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals HD damage. On 16+: The attack deals HD+2 damage and the Shadowdancer becomes Invisible for 1 round.
Evasion(Passive) Takes half damage from all area-of-effect abilities.

name: Elven Beast-Tamer
description:
A wild-looking elf with tangled hair and simple hide armor, accompanied by a loyal, snarling lynx companion.

Go for the Throat!(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Beast-Tamer's lynx companion makes a melee attack against a target. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The lynx hits, dealing HD damage and the target is Bleeding for 1d4 damage for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The lynx hits for HD damage. On 16+: The character avoids the attack.

name: Elven High Priestess
description:
An ancient, serene elf in flowing white and silver robes, carrying a staff topped with a crescent moon symbol that glows with a soft, calming light.

Soothing Light(Active, Costs 3 MP) Make a roll to heal. On 1-8: One ally within 6 squares heals for MD. On 9-15: One ally within 6 squares heals for x2MD. On 16+: Up to three allies within 6 squares heal for MD.
Aura of Peace(Passive) Enemies that end their turn adjacent to the Priestess cannot make Attacks of Opportunity until their next turn.

name: Elven Vengeance Knight
description:
A grim, imposing elf in heavy, dark grey plate armor, wielding a massive greatsword with a jagged, serrated edge.

Vow of Enmity(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Knight targets one character. For the rest of the combat, all of the Knight's attacks against that character deal +2 damage.
Armor of Spite(Passive) When hit by a melee attack, the attacker takes 1d4 HD damage.

name: Elven Trickster
description:
A wiry elf with a fox-like grin and eyes that sparkle with mischief, wearing a motley collection of brightly colored silks and carrying a short, curved dagger.

Mirror Image(Active, Costs 3 MP) Make a roll to create illusions. On 1-8: The next attack against the Trickster has disadvantage. On 9-15: The Trickster creates one illusionary duplicate; the next attack against it automatically misses. On 16+: The Trickster creates two duplicates; the next two attacks against it automatically miss.

name: Elven Scout
description:
An elf with weathered features and short, practical hair, wearing a camouflage cloak and carrying a pair of keen-edged shortswords.

Trailblazer(Passive) This creature is not slowed by difficult terrain.
Swift Strike(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals HD damage. On 16+: The attack deals HD damage, and the Scout may immediately move 2 squares for free.

name: Elven Loremaster
description:
An ancient, wizened elf with long, flowing white hair and deeply wrinkled skin, poring over a massive, leather-bound tome that floats in front of him.

Seal of Silence(Active, Costs 3 SP) The Loremaster targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (INT). On 1-8: The character is silenced and cannot cast spells for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character is silenced for 1 round. On 16+: The character resists the seal.
Ancient Lore(Passive) At the start of combat, this creature learns one weakness (e.g., fire, ice, slashing) of a random player character.

name: Dwarven Ironclad
description:
A walking fortress of interlocking iron plates and a massive tower shield, whose only visible feature is a stern, braided beard peeking from beneath a heavy helmet.

Shield Wall(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Ironclad braces for impact. Until its next turn, all damage it takes is reduced by 2.
Shield Bash(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Ironclad bashes a target. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The character is hit, takes HD damage, and is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: The character takes HD damage. On 16+: The character deflects the bash and is unaffected.

name: Dwarven Runesmith
description:
An ancient dwarf with a long, white beard tucked into his belt, whose hands and arms are covered in glowing blue runic tattoos that match the ones on his hammer.

Rune of Sunder(Active, Costs 2 MP) The Runesmith strikes a target's armor. The player must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: The target's armor is reduced by 2 for the rest of the combat. On 9-15: The target's armor is reduced by 1. On 16+: The target's armor holds firm.

name: Dwarven Marksman
description:
A stout dwarf with a braided beard and a keen eye, resting a large, intricately geared heavy crossbow on a deployable metal stand.

Power Shot(Active, Costs 3 HP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (15 squares). On 1-8: The shot misses and the crossbow needs an action to reload. On 9-15: The shot deals x2HD damage. On 16+: The shot deals x2HD damage and ignores all armor.

name: Dwarven Berserker
description:
A wild-eyed, bare-chested dwarf with a bright orange mohawk and blue war paint, who charges into battle wielding two jagged hand-axes.

Death Wish(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Berserker makes a reckless melee attack. On a hit, it deals HD+3 damage but takes 1d4 damage in return.
Taste of Blood(Passive) When this creature deals damage to a Bleeding target, it heals for 2 HP.

name: Dwarven Brewer
description:
A jolly, red-nosed dwarf with a magnificent, frothy beard and a large, sloshing cask strapped to his back.

Splash Ale(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Brewer splashes ale at a target within 3 squares. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target is soaked and becomes Weakened for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target is splashed and becomes Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character avoids the splash.

name: Dwarven Shieldmaiden
description:
A fierce female dwarf with a long, braided red ponytail and determined eyes, expertly wielding a round shield and a sharp hand-axe.

Intercept(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Shieldmaiden moves to protect an ally. Make a roll. On 1-8: She is too slow. On 9-15: She moves adjacent to an ally within 3 squares and takes the next attack intended for them. On 16+: She moves adjacent to an ally within 3 squares and takes the next attack intended for them, gaining +1 Armor against it.

name: Dwarven Miner
description:
A soot-covered dwarf with a dusty beard and a single candle-lantern attached to his mining helmet, hefting a heavy, well-used pickaxe.

Shattering Blow(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Miner swings his pickaxe at a target. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and their armor is reduced by 1 for the rest of the combat. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage. On 16+: The target avoids the blow.

name: Dwarven Thane
description:
A noble dwarf lord with a meticulously groomed, grey-streaked beard clasped with gold rings, wearing regal plate armor and carrying a massive, glowing warhammer.

For the Clan!(Active, Costs 3 SP) Make a roll to issue a war cry. On 1-8: The cry is ignored. On 9-15: One allied Dwarf within 5 squares gains +3 forward on their next roll. On 16+: All allied Dwarves within 5 squares gain advantage on their next roll.
Storm Hammer(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to throw a magical hammer at a target within 6 squares. On 1-8: The hammer misses. On 9-15: It hits for MD magical damage. On 16+: It hits for MD magical damage and the target is Stunned for 1 round.

name: Dwarven Mountaineer
description:
A rugged dwarf in practical climbing gear with a coiled rope on his back, carrying a sturdy pickaxe in one hand and a grappling hook in the other.

Grappling Hook(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Mountaineer targets a character within 4 squares. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character is hooked and Pulled 2 squares. On 9-15: The character is snagged and Pulled 1 square. On 16+: The hook fails to find purchase.

name: Dwarven Tunnel Rat
description:
A small, lean dwarf with a black-dyed beard and dark leather armor, moving with a surprising stealthiness and carrying a bag of caltrops.

Caltrops(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Tunnel Rat scatters caltrops in a 2x2 area. That area becomes difficult terrain for the rest of the combat.
Ambush(Passive) This creature's first attack from a hidden or unseen position deals +HD damage.

name: Gnomish Gear-Grinder
description:
A gnome in grease-stained overalls wielding a massive, motorized pipe wrench that spins with a menacing whine.

Overclocked Swing(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll to attack an adjacent enemy. On 1-8: The wrench jams, dealing 1d6 damage to the Gnome. On 9-15: The attack deals HD+2 physical damage. On 16+: The attack deals x2HD physical damage.

name: Gnomish Illusionist
description:
A flamboyant gnome in multi-colored robes whose outline constantly shimmers and blurs, making them hard to focus on.

Phantasmal Force(Active, Costs 2 MP) The Illusionist targets a character's mind. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The character believes the illusion, taking MD psychic damage and becoming Frightened for 1 round. On 9-15: The character takes MD psychic damage. On 16+: The character disbelieves the illusion.
Displacement(Passive) Attacks against this creature have disadvantage unless the attacker has truesight.

name: Clockwork Grenadier
description:
A gnome covered in bandoliers of ticking metal spheres, laughing manically behind thick protective goggles.

Cluster Bomb(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll to throw a bomb at a square within 6 squares. On 1-8: The bomb scatters 1d4 squares and deals half MD fire damage in a 1-square radius. On 9-15: It hits, dealing MD fire damage in a 2-square radius. On 16+: It hits, dealing MD fire damage in a 2-square radius and targets are Stunned for 1 round.

name: Deep Gnome Gloomstalker
description:
A grey-skinned gnome in chameleon-hide leather, armed with a blowgun and blending perfectly into the shadows of the cave walls.

Poison Dart(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Gloomstalker fires at a character within 5 squares. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The character takes 1 damage and is Poisoned for 1d6 damage for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character takes 1 damage and is Poisoned for 1d4 damage for 1 round. On 16+: The character resists the poison entirely.
Camouflage(Passive) This creature can attempt to hide even when not behind cover if it is in dim light or darkness.

name: Arcane Mechanic
description:
A gnome wearing spectacles with glowing blue lenses, fine-tuning a floating, crystal-powered sentry drone hovering over their shoulder.

Arcane Turret(Active, Costs 3 MP) Make a roll to deploy a turret in an adjacent square. On 1-8: The turret fizzles and breaks. On 9-15: The turret lasts for 2 rounds, making one ranged attack per round dealing MD damage. On 16+: The turret lasts for 3 rounds, making one ranged attack per round dealing MD+2 damage.

name: Gnomish Mind-Meddler
description:
A gnome with an oversized forehead and an unsettling stare, wearing a metal cap sparking with psychic amplifiers.

Mental Static(Active, Costs 2 SP) The gnome projects psychic noise at a target within 6 squares. The player must Defy Danger (INT). On 1-8: The character takes SD damage and cannot cast spells or use complex items for 1 round. On 9-15: The character takes SD damage. On 16+: The character resists the effect.

name: Chem-Warped Runt
description:
A jittery gnome whose skin has turned a sickly green from chemical exposure, wielding a syringe-tipped spear dripping with glowing ichor.

Mutagen Injection(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Runt stabs a target. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and transforms into a harmless small animal for 1 round. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage and is Poisoned for 1d4 damage for 1 round. On 16+: The target takes HD damage.

name: Gnomish Negotiator
description:
A smartly dressed gnome in fine velvet with a winning smile and a spring-loaded dagger hidden up their sleeve.

Fast Talk(Active, Costs 2 SP) The gnome tries to bewilder a target. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The character becomes Confused for 1 round. On 9-15: The character becomes Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character sees through the ruse.
Sleeve Dagger(Passive) This creature's first melee attack in combat deals x2HD damage.

name: Steam-Armor Pilot
description:
A tiny gnome strapped inside a bulky, hissing suit of copper-plated, steam-powered armor wielding a hydraulic claw.

Steam Vent(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll to vent superheated steam. On 1-8: The suit overheats, dealing 1d6 damage to the Pilot. On 9-15: All adjacent creatures take 1d6 fire damage. On 16+: All adjacent creatures take 1d6 fire damage and are Blinded for 1 round.
Plated Hull(Passive) All physical damage (HD) taken is reduced by 2.

name: Lawn Guardian
description:
An animated terracotta statue of a jovial gnome with a red pointed hat, wielding a surprisingly sharp gardening trowel.

Petrifying Gaze(Active, Costs 2 MP) The Guardian stares at a target within 4 squares. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The character turns to stone and is Stunned for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character is Slowed for 1 round. On 16+: The character resists the magic.
False Appearance(Passive) While motionless, this creature is indistinguishable from an ordinary statue.

name: City Watch Captain
description:
A grizzled veteran in polished city-watch plate armor, carrying a heavy tower shield and a stern, authoritative presence.

Shield Up!(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Captain gains +2 Armor until their next turn.
Halt!(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Captain targets a character within 3 squares. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The character is intimidated and is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: The character hesitates and is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character ignores the command.

name: Rogue Alchemist
description:
A wiry human in a stained leather apron and thick goggles, cackling as they shake a fizzing, glowing flask.

Caustic Bomb(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to throw a bomb at a target square within 6 squares. On 1-8: The bomb lands 1d4 squares off-target. On 9-15: It hits, creating a 2-square radius pool of acid for 1 round that deals MD to any creature entering it. On 16+: The pool is a 3-square radius and lasts for 2 rounds.

name: Hedge Knight
description:
A wandering warrior in dented, mismatched armor, carrying a heavy but reliable longsword and a grim expression.

Power Strike(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Knight makes a powerful melee swing at a character. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character is hit for x2HD damage. On 9-15: The character takes a glancing blow for HD damage. On 16+: The character avoids the attack.

name: Street Urchin Gang
description:
A small swarm of fast, scrappy children in ragged clothes who work together with surprising efficiency to distract and overwhelm their targets.

Swarm Tactics(Passive) This creature deals +2 damage for each other allied creature adjacent to its target.
Pelt with Rocks(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll to throw rocks at a target within 4 squares. On 1-8: The rocks miss. On 9-15: The target takes 1d4 HD. On 16+: The target takes 1d4 HD and is Weakened for 1 round.

name: Fanatical Zealot
description:
A wild-eyed ascetic in simple robes, whose body is covered in holy symbols and self-inflicted scars, clutching a flail with fanatical devotion.

Martyr's Strike(Active, Costs 3 HP) Make a roll to strike an enemy. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The Zealot takes 1d4 damage and deals MD+2 holy damage to the target. On 16+: The Zealot takes 1d4 damage and deals x2MD holy damage to the target.

name: Master Duelist
description:
An aristocratic fighter with a confident smirk and impeccable posture, wielding a slender, razor-sharp rapier with lightning-fast precision.

Riposte(Active, Costs 2 SP) When an enemy misses the Duelist with a melee attack, it may use its reaction. Make a roll. On 1-8: The counter-attack misses. On 9-15: It deals HD damage. On 16+: It deals HD damage and the enemy is Weakened for 1 round.

name: Mountain Hermit
description:
A gaunt, wild-haired human with calloused hands and feet, whose skin is like leather and whose eyes hold the feral wisdom of the mountains.

Feral Strike(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Hermit makes a melee attack. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and is Bleeding for 1d4 damage for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage. On 16+: The attack is dodged.

name: Plague Doctor
description:
A tall, slender figure in a dark, heavy cloak and a grotesque, beaked mask filled with pungent herbs, carrying a leather satchel of dubious medical instruments.

Blight Syringe(Active, Costs 2 MP) The Doctor attacks a target in melee. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The target takes 1d4 HD and is afflicted with a disease, taking MD at the start of their next 2 turns. On 9-15: The target takes 1d4 HD and is afflicted for 1 turn. On 16+: The target avoids the needle.

name: Royal Sorcerer
description:
A haughty, well-dressed mage in fine silks, whose fingers crackle with raw arcane power as they prepare a devastating spell.

Arcane Bolt(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (10 squares). On 1-8: The bolt misses. On 9-15: The bolt hits, dealing MD magical damage. On 16+: The bolt hits, dealing x2MD magical damage.
Mana Shield(Passive) The first time this creature takes damage in combat, it loses 2 MP instead of HP.

name: Pit Fighter Champion
description:
A massive, muscle-bound brawler covered in tattoos and fighting pit scars, wearing nothing but studded leather bracers and loincloth.

Pummel(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Champion attacks a character. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The character takes HD damage and is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: The character takes HD damage. On 16+: The character weathers the blow.
Haymaker(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8 or 9-15: The attack deals HD damage. On 16+: The attack deals x2HD damage.

name: Spoon-Bending Psion
description:
A frail, golden-skinned humanoid with a large mustache and pointed ears, its eyes are closed in deep concentration as it levitates two bent metal spoons.

Psybeam(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (8 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals MD psychic damage. On 16+: The attack deals MD psychic damage and the target is Confused for 1 round.
Kinesis(Active, Costs 1 SP) The Psion targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The target is Weakened for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character resists the mental assault.

name: Four-Armed Mauler
description:
A massive, four-armed humanoid with tough, grey-blue skin and a reptilian face, wearing a champion's belt and ready to strike with all four fists.

Seismic Toss(Active, Costs 3 HP) The Mauler grabs a character. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The character is thrown up to 4 squares and takes x2HD damage upon landing. On 9-15: The character is thrown up to 2 squares and takes HD damage. On 16+: The character breaks the grab.

name: Shadow Jester
description:
A portly, bipedal creature made of dark purple shadow, with two glowing red eyes and a permanent, unnervingly wide grin.

Hypnosis(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Jester targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The character falls asleep and is Stunned for 2 rounds or until they take damage. On 9-15: The character is Stunned for 1 round. On 16+: The character resists the hypnosis.
Shadow Possession(Passive) This creature can hide within another creature's shadow, becoming untargetable until it attacks.

name: Flame-Mane Lion
description:
A massive, noble canine with tiger-like black stripes on its orange fur and a glorious, flowing mane made entirely of living fire.

Flare Blitz(Active, Costs 3 HP) Make a roll to charge a target. On 1-8: The charge misses. On 9-15: The attack deals x2HD fire damage, but this creature takes half of that damage in recoil. On 16+: The attack deals x2HD fire damage, and this creature only takes 1/4 of that damage in recoil.
Extreme Speed(Passive) This creature's speed is increased by 2.

name: Rolling Citadel
description:
A colossal, spherical creature made of solid rock that can retract its head and four limbs to roll at incredible speeds.

Rollout(Active, Costs 1 HP) Deals HD damage. If used again on the next turn, its damage increases by +2, stacking up to 5 times.
Self-Destruct(Active, Costs 10 HP) Make a roll to explode. On 1-8: The explosion fizzles, dealing x2HD damage in a 1-square radius. On 9-15: It deals x3HD damage in a 3-square radius. On 16+: It deals x4HD damage in a 4-square radius. This creature is defeated.

name: Serene Sea-Beast
description:
A gentle, long-necked marine creature resembling a plesiosaur, with intelligent, kind eyes and a large, spined shell on its back that can carry passengers.

Surf(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to summon a wave. On 1-8: The wave is small. On 9-15: All creatures in a 4-square line take MD water damage. On 16+: All creatures in a 6-square line take MD water damage and are Pushed 1.
Ice Beam(Active, Costs 2 MP) A target must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target takes MD ice damage and is Immobilized for 1 round. On 9-15: The target takes MD ice damage. On 16+: The target takes half damage.

name: Slumbering Giant
description:
An enormous, rotund, bear-like beast with dark teal fur and a cream-colored belly, almost always found sleeping soundly and blocking important paths.

Rest(Active) The Giant falls asleep. It heals for 2d10 HP and removes all conditions, but is Stunned for 1 round.
Body Slam(Active, Costs 3 HP) The Giant slams a target. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The character is hit, takes x2HD damage, and is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: The character takes x2HD damage. On 16+: The character dodges the attack.

name: Tri-Magnet Cluster
description:
A bizarre creature formed from three sentient, metallic spheres, each with a single red eye, held together by a powerful, crackling magnetic field.

Thunder Wave(Active, Costs 2 MP) A target must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: The target is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: The target is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The target resists the effect.
Tri-Attack(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (7 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals MD magical damage. On 16+: The attack deals MD magical damage and the target is randomly either Burning, Slowed, or Weakened for 1 round.

name: Mantis Scythe-Claw
description:
A sleek, green bipedal insectoid with a reptilian head and razor-sharp scythes for forelimbs, whose wings on its back are for balance, not flight.

Swords Dance(Active, Costs 2 SP) Make a roll to focus. On 1-8: The dance is clumsy; the creature is Weakened for 1 round. On 9-15: The creature's HD attacks deal +2 damage for 2 rounds. On 16+: The creature's HD attacks deal +4 damage for 2 rounds.
Quick Slash(Active, Costs 1 HP) This creature makes a melee attack that deals HD damage and may move 2 squares for free.

name: Pendulum Weaver
description:
A stout, yellow-skinned bipedal creature with a long, drooping nose and heavy eyelids, holding a gleaming, crystal pendulum that swings in a constant, mesmerizing rhythm.

Hypnosis(Active, Costs 3 SP) The Weaver targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The target falls asleep and is Stunned for 2 rounds or until they take damage. On 9-15: The target is Stunned for 1 round. On 16+: The character averts their gaze and is unaffected.

name: Beholder Sprout
description:
A floating, grapefruit-sized sphere of flesh with a large central eye and three smaller, writhing eyestalks, each glowing with a different magical energy.

Eye Rays(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to fire a magical ray at a target within 6 squares. On 1-8: The ray misses. On 9-15: The target is Slowed for 1 round. On 16+: The target is Slowed for 2 rounds and takes MD magical damage.

name: Manticore Cub
description:
A creature with the body of a lion cub and a humanoid face, but with small, leathery bat wings and a long, scorpion-like tail tipped with a venomous barb.

Tail Spike(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Manticore flings a spike at a target within 7 squares. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and is Poisoned for 1d6 damage for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage and is Poisoned for 1d4 damage for 1 round. On 16+: The target takes HD damage but avoids the poison.

name: Owlbear Cub
description:
A round, fluffy creature with the body and powerful limbs of a bear cub, but covered in the soft, brown-and-white feathers of an owl and possessing a large, beaked head with enormous, unblinking golden eyes.

Furious Swipes(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: Makes two attacks, each for HD damage. On 16+: Makes three attacks, each for HD damage.

name: Gargoyle Hatchling
description:
A small, winged humanoid creature made of rough, grey stone, with small horns, clawed hands and feet, and two glowing red pinpricks for eyes.

Stone Form(Active) The Hatchling becomes indistinguishable from a stone statue, gaining +3 Armor but its speed becomes 0 until it uses this ability again.
Dive(Active, Costs 1 HP) If perched or flying, it can dive on a target below. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The attack deals x2HD damage. On 9-15: The attack deals HD damage. On 16+: The attack is avoided.

name: Mimic Chestling
description:
This creature perfectly resembles a small, iron-banded wooden chest, until it suddenly unfolds a massive, toothy maw and a single, large, unblinking eye on a fleshy stalk.

Bite(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals HD damage. On 16+: The attack deals HD damage and the target is Immobilized until the start of the Chestling's next turn.
False Appearance(Passive) This creature is indistinguishable from an ordinary chest while motionless.

name: Rust Mite
description:
A six-legged, beetle-like insect the size of a small dog, with a thick, reddish-brown carapace and two feathery antennae that twitch constantly, seeking metal.

Corrode Metal(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Mite touches a target's metal armor or weapon. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The item is corroded, permanently reducing its effectiveness (Armor -1 or a weapon's HD -2). On 9-15: The item is damaged, giving the wielder disadvantage on their next roll using it. On 16+: The character pulls away in time.

name: Displacer Kitten
description:
A sleek, black panther cub whose form constantly shimmers, making it appear a few inches to the left of its actual position, and from whose shoulders sprout two shadowy, tentacle-like appendages.

Displacement(Passive) All HD and MD attacks against this creature have disadvantage. This effect is suppressed for 1 round after the creature takes damage.
Tentacle Strike(Action) Melee attack with Reach (2 squares) that deals HD damage.

name: Gelatinous Cubelet
description:
A perfectly transparent, 3-foot cube of silent, quivering ooze that slowly slides across the ground, its form nearly invisible until it's too late.

Engulf(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Cubelet attempts to engulf an adjacent character. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character is engulfed, becoming Immobilized and taking 1d6 MD acid damage at the start of their turn. On 9-15: The character is only partially caught and is Slowed for 1 round. On 16+: The character avoids the ooze.

name: Hellhound Pup
description:
A playful but dangerous puppy with glossy black fur, four glowing red eyes, and a breath that comes out as puffs of hot, acrid smoke.

Ember Breath(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll to breathe fire in a 3-square cone. On 1-8: The breath is just smoke. On 9-15: Deals 1d6 MD fire damage to all targets in the cone. On 16+: Deals 1d6 MD fire damage and all targets are Burning for 1d4 damage for 1 round.

name: Troll Whelp
description:
A lanky, gangly, green-skinned humanoid with a long nose, pointed ears, and a perpetual sneer, armed with a crudely sharpened spear.

Regeneration(Passive) At the start of its turn, this creature heals for 2 HP.
Tantrum(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack deals HD damage. On 9-15: The attack deals HD damage and the Whelp can make a second attack. On 16+: The attack deals HD damage and the Whelp can make two more attacks.

name: Griffin Hatchling
description:
A small, feisty griffin with the downy feathers of a chick on its eagle head and the clumsy, oversized paws of a lion cub.

Peck(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8 or 9-15: Deals HD damage. On 16+: Deals HD damage and the target is Weakened for 1 round.
Gust(Active, Costs 1 MP) The Hatchling flaps its wings. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The character is Pushed 2 squares. On 9-15: The character is Pushed 1 square. On 16+: The character stands firm.

name: Stone Golemite
description:
A small, floating boulder with two detached, smaller rocks that serve as crude, hovering fists.

Rock Throw(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (5 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals HD damage. On 16+: The attack deals HD+2 damage.
Harden(Active) The Golemite gains +2 Armor until its next turn.

name: Basilisk Whelp
description:
A young, serpentine lizard with sickly green scales and a hood that flares when it feels threatened, revealing two large, hypnotic eye-spots.

Paralyzing Gaze(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Whelp glares at a target within 4 squares. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The character is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: The character is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character averts their eyes and is unaffected.

name: Noctule Pup
description:
A small, spherical creature covered in fuzzy purple fur, with two large, leathery wings but no visible eyes, navigating entirely by sound.

Leech Life(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals HD damage, and the Noctule heals for half that amount. On 16+: The attack deals HD damage, and the Noctule heals for the full amount.

name: Myconid Sprout
description:
A tiny, bipedal mushroom-person with a blue cap dotted with white spots, whose face is a pair of simple, black, unblinking eyes.

Sleep Spores(Active, Costs 2 MP) The Sprout releases spores. All adjacent characters must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: They fall asleep and are Stunned until they take damage. On 9-15: They are Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: They are unaffected.

name: Will-o'-Wisp
description:
A floating sphere of spectral purple fire with a mischievous, grinning face that flickers within the flames.

Curse(Active, Costs 3 SP) The Wisp curses a target within 5 squares. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The character takes 1d6 MD at the start of their next 2 turns. On 9-15: The character takes 1d6 MD at the start of their next turn. On 16+: The curse fails.
Incorporeal(Passive) Takes half damage from non-magical physical sources (HD).

name: Rock Drake
description:
A colossal serpent composed of a long chain of massive, interconnected grey boulders that grind together as it moves.

Rock Tomb(Active, Costs 3 HP) Make a roll to summon rocks around a target within 7 squares. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The target is surrounded by difficult terrain. On 16+: The target is Immobilized for 2 rounds.
Slam(Active, Costs 1 HP) A melee attack that deals HD+3 damage.

name: River Hydra Whelp
description:
A small, serpentine water dragon with two heads, fins for ears, and a mischievous expression.

Dual Water Gun(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: One jet of water misses. On 9-15: One jet hits for MD water damage. On 16+: Both jets hit, dealing x2MD water damage to one or two targets.
Smokescreen(Active, Costs 1 MP) Creates a 2x2 area of dense ink that heavily obscures vision.

name: Arcane Homunculus
description:
A magically-created humanoid with smooth grey skin, a slender feline-like body, and a long, thin tail, whose large purple eyes glow with immense psychic power.

Psyshock(Active, Costs 3 MP) The Homunculus attacks a target's mind within 8 squares. The player must Defy Danger (INT). On 1-8: The target takes x2MD psychic damage. On 9-15: The target takes MD psychic damage. On 16+: The target takes half MD damage.
Barrier(Active, Costs 2 MP) Gains +2 Armor until its next turn.

name: Cockatrice Chick
description:
A flightless, two-headed bird covered in shaggy brown feathers, each head constantly pecking and squabbling with the other.

Fury Attack(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: Makes two attacks, each for HD damage. On 16+: Makes four attacks, each for HD damage.
Petrifying Peck(Passive) On a critical hit, the target is Stunned for 1 round.

name: Minotaur Runt
description:
A young, powerfully built humanoid with the head of a bull, a snarling snout, and two short, sharp horns, who paws the ground impatiently.

Gore(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Minotaur charges a target. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target takes x2HD damage and is Pushed 2 squares. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage. On 16+: The character dodges completely.

name: Harpy Fledgling
description:
A creature with the torso and head of a gaunt woman, but with large, feathery wings instead of arms and powerful, raptor-like talons for feet.

Piercing Shriek(Active, Costs 2 SP) Make a roll to screech. On 1-8: A single target within 5 squares is Weakened for 1 round. On 9-15: All targets in a 4-square cone are Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: All targets in a 4-square cone are Weakened for 2 rounds.

name: Centaur Scout
description:
A creature with the torso of a muscular human seamlessly joined to the powerful, four-legged body of a wild horse, carrying a sturdy shortbow.

Gallop and Shoot(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Centaur moves up to its speed and makes a ranged attack. Make a roll. On 1-8: The shot misses. On 9-15: The shot deals HD damage. On 16+: The shot deals HD+2 damage.

name: Dryad Sapling
description:
A shy, child-like humanoid whose skin is the texture of smooth, pale birch bark and whose hair is a cascade of green leaves and small white flowers.

Enthralling Presence(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Dryad targets a character within 4 squares. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The character is Charmed for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character resists the fey glamour.

name: Gorgon Calf
description:
A young but powerful bull whose hide is made of overlapping plates of verdigris-coated bronze, which snorts clouds of thick, greenish vapor.

Petrifying Breath(Active, Costs 3 MP) Make a roll to breathe a cone of gas. On 1-8: The breath is just vapor. On 9-15: All characters in a 3-square cone are Slowed for 2 rounds. On 16+: All characters in a 3-square cone are Stunned for 1 round.

name: Naga Spell-Serpent
description:
A creature with the torso of a lithe, blue-skinned humanoid and the lower body of a great, coiling serpent, its four arms each weaving a different water spell.

Tidal Lash(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to unleash a wave in a 4-square cone. On 1-8: The wave is a weak splash. On 9-15: All targets in the cone take 1d6 MD water damage. On 16+: All targets in the cone take 1d6 MD water damage and are Pushed 2 squares.

name: Kobold Trap-Maker
description:
A small, scaly, reptilian humanoid with a dog-like snout and a perpetually nervous, yipping demeanor, clutching a bag of springs, rope, and sharp objects.

Scrap Trap(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll to set a trap in an adjacent square. On 1-8: The trap springs on the Kobold, who becomes Immobilized for 1 round. On 9-15: It creates a simple caltrop trap, making the square difficult terrain. On 16+: It creates a spring-loaded net; the next creature to enter the square is Immobilized for 2 rounds.

name: Satyr Piper
description:
A creature with the torso of a wiry, athletic humanoid, the furry legs and cloven hooves of a goat, and two small, curled horns on its head, playing an enchanting melody on a set of panpipes.

Pan's Pipes(Active, Costs 3 SP) Make a roll to play a melody. On 1-8: The tune is awful, and one random creature (friend or foe) is Weakened for 1 round. On 9-15: One enemy within 5 squares is Charmed for 1 round. On 16+: All enemies within 3 squares are Charmed for 1 round.

name: Wyvern Stinger
description:
A feral, two-legged dragon with a leathery hide, powerful wings, and a long, muscular tail tipped with a dripping, venomous stinger.

Sting Dive(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Wyvern dives on a target. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and is Poisoned for 1d8 MD for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage and is Poisoned for 1d6 MD for 1 round. On 16+: The target takes half HD damage and resists the poison.

name: Ettin Brute
description:
A hulking, two-headed giant with mismatched eyes and crude, ill-fitting armor, its two heads arguing with each other as each wields a massive club.

Dual Brain(Passive) This creature gets two turns in the initiative order each round (e.g., once at its initiative, and once at initiative -10).
Double Swing(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Ettin makes two separate melee attacks, which can be against the same or different targets.

name: Night Elf Archer
description:
A lithe, purple-skinned elf with long, pointed ears and glowing silver eyes, clad in dark leather and wielding a gracefully curved bow.

Shadowmeld(Active) If in dim light or darkness, the Archer can use its action to become Invisible until it moves or attacks.
Elven Accuracy(Passive) This creature's ranged attacks gain +1 to hit.

name: Sentinel Glaive-Thrower
description:
A disciplined warrior in ornate, leaf-patterned plate armor, preparing to launch a deadly, three-bladed glaive that magically returns to her hand.

Ricochet Glaive(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (8 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals HD damage to one target. On 16+: The attack deals HD damage to one target and then bounces to a second target within 3 squares for half HD damage.

name: Priestess of Elune
description:
A serene elf in flowing silver robes, her hands glowing with a soft, gentle moonlight as she chants a prayer to the Moon Goddess.

Moonfire(Active, Costs 2 MP) A target within 8 squares is struck by a beam of light. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character takes MD magical damage and is Burning for 1d4 damage for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character takes MD magical damage. On 16+: The character takes half damage.
Heal(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to heal an ally within 6 squares. On 1-8: The ally heals for 1d6 HP. On 9-15: The ally heals for MD. On 16+: The ally heals for MD+5 HP.
