name: Druid of the Talon
description:
A lithe elf adorned with dark feathers and a bird-skull helm, capable of shifting into the form of a vicious storm crow.

Faerie Fire(Active, Costs 2 MP) The Druid targets a character within 7 squares. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target is outlined in faerie fire, reducing their Armor by 2 for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target's Armor is reduced by 1 for 2 rounds. On 16+: The character avoids the effect.

name: Druid of the Claw
description:
A powerfully built elf covered in bear pelts and claw marks, who can transform into a massive, rage-fueled bear.

Bear Form(Active, Costs 3 MP) Make a roll to shapeshift. On 1-8: The transformation is painful, dealing 1d6 damage to the Druid. On 9-15: The Druid gains +10 temporary HP and its HD becomes 1d10 for 2 rounds. On 16+: The Druid gains +15 temporary HP and its HD becomes 1d10 for 3 rounds.

name: Ancient of War
description:
A colossal, walking tree whose trunk is shaped into a stern, bearded elven face and whose mighty branches serve as powerful, club-like arms.

Uproot(Active) The Ancient roots itself to the ground, gaining +2 Armor but its speed becomes 0 until it uses this ability again.
Rock Throw(Active, Costs 1 HP, While Uprooted) Make a roll for a ranged attack (8 squares). On 1-8 or 9-15: It deals HD damage. On 16+: It deals HD+3 damage.

name: Mountain Giant
description:
A titanic humanoid whose body appears to be carved from the living stone of a mountain, with craggy features and glowing magma veins.

Taunt(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Giant taunts a target. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The character is Taunted for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character is Taunted for 1 round. On 16+: The character resists the taunt.
Boulder Toss(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (7 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals x2HD damage. On 16+: It deals x2HD damage and the target is knocked prone.

name: Keeper of the Grove
description:
A powerful being with the lower body of a great stag and the upper torso of a muscular night elf, wielding a gnarled staff entwined with living vines.

Entangling Roots(Active, Costs 3 MP) The Keeper targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character is Immobilized for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character is Slowed for 2 rounds. On 16+: The character evades the roots.
Thorns Aura(Passive) Any character who hits the Keeper with a melee attack takes 1d4 MD.

name: Demon Hunter
description:
A heavily tattooed, blindfolded night elf with small, vestigial horns and demonic-looking bat wings, who darts through the air wielding a pair of crescent-shaped warglaives.

Mana Burn(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack deals HD damage. On 9-15: The attack deals HD damage and burns 1d4 of the target's MP. On 16+: The attack deals HD damage and burns 1d8 of the target's MP.
Evasion(Passive) Has a 25% chance to evade any HD attack.

name: Warden
description:
A mysterious, heavily armored figure in a spiked, concealing helmet and a voluminous dark cloak, who seems to teleport through shadows.

Fan of Knives(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll to throw knives at all adjacent characters. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: All targets take 1d6 HD. On 16+: All targets take 1d6 HD and are Bleeding for 1d4 damage for 1 round.
Blink(Active, Costs 2 MP) The Warden teleports to an empty square within 5 squares.

name: Forsaken Apothecary
description:
A hunched, cloaked figure in a gas mask, gleefully tossing glass vials filled with bubbling, corrosive plague concoctions.

Blight Bomb(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to throw a bomb at a square within 5 squares. On 1-8: The bomb lands 1d4 squares off-target. On 9-15: It hits, creating a 2-square radius pool of blight for 1 round that deals MD to any creature entering it. On 16+: The pool is a 3-square radius and lasts for 2 rounds.

name: Risen Footman
description:
The reanimated corpse of a human soldier, its armor rusted and its movements stiff, mindlessly clutching a broken sword and a splintered shield.

Shield Bash(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Footman bashes a target. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The target is hit, takes HD damage, and is Weakened for 1 round. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage. On 16+: The character deflects the bash.
Undying Will(Passive) The first time this creature is reduced to 0 HP, it returns to life with 1 HP at the start of its next turn.

name: Shadow Priestess
description:
A former priestess of the Light, now a gaunt, pale figure in tattered black vestments whose touch drains the mind and soul.

Mind Flay(Active, Costs 2 MP) The Priestess channels shadow at a target within 7 squares. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The target takes SD magical damage and is Slowed for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target takes SD magical damage. On 16+: The target takes half damage.

name: Deathguard Assassin
description:
A lithe, skeletal figure in a tight-fitting black leather uniform and a plague mask, wielding two long daggers coated in a debilitating poison.

Crippling Poison(Passive) Any character damaged by this creature's HD becomes Weakened for 1 round.
Ambush(Active, Costs 2 HP) If hidden, make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack deals HD damage. On 9-15: The attack deals x2HD damage. On 16+: The attack deals x2HD damage and the target is Stunned for 1 round.

name: Abomination
description:
A massive, grotesque giant stitched together from the mismatched body parts of various creatures, wielding a massive meat hook and a heavy cleaver.

Hook(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Abomination hurls its hook at a target within 4 squares. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character is hooked, takes HD damage, and is Pulled 2 squares. On 9-15: The character is hooked and Pulled 1 square. On 16+: The character avoids the hook.
Putrid Bile(Passive) When this creature takes damage from a melee attack, the attacker takes 1d4 MD acid damage.

name: Banshee Wailer
description:
The spectral, shrieking form of a former elven sorceress, her ethereal body flickering as she floats menacingly.

Anti-Magic Shell(Active, Costs 3 MP) Make a roll to create a magical shield. On 1-8: The shell fails. On 9-15: The Banshee becomes immune to all magical damage for 1 round. On 16+: The Banshee becomes immune to all magical damage and effects for 2 rounds.
Curse(Active, Costs 2 SP) A target within 6 squares must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The target has disadvantage on all rolls for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target has disadvantage on their next roll. On 16+: The curse is resisted.

name: Skeletal Mage
description:
A reanimated skeleton in tattered blue robes, its bony hands crackling with arcs of frigid, necrotic energy.

Frostbolt(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (8 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: Deals MD cold damage. On 16+: Deals MD cold damage and the target is Slowed for 1 round.

name: Geist
description:
A weak, tormented spirit that flickers in and out of sight, its touch draining the warmth from living creatures.

Chilling Touch(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: Deals 1d4 MD cold damage. On 16+: Deals 1d4 MD cold damage and the target is Weakened for 1 round.
Incorporeal(Passive) Takes half damage from non-magical physical sources (HD).

name: Val'kyr Aspirant
description:
A spectral, winged female warrior spirit, her form flickering between light and shadow as she wields a ghostly spear.

Spirit Strike(Active, Costs 1 MP) The Aspirant attacks a target. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The target takes MD magical damage and their next healing received is halved. On 9-15: The target takes MD magical damage. On 16+: The target takes half damage.

name: Rotting Behemoth
description:
The colossal, reanimated corpse of a giant, its flesh bloated and covered in plague-boils that weep a toxic effluence.

Plague Stomp(Active, Costs 3 HP) Make a roll to stomp the ground. On 1-8: The stomp is weak. On 9-15: All adjacent characters take HD damage. On 16+: All adjacent characters take HD damage and are Poisoned for 1d6 MD for 1 round.
Disease Cloud(Passive) Any character that starts their turn adjacent to the Behemoth takes 1d4 MD.

name: Shrieking Horror
description:
A floating, disembodied head with a gaping maw and hair made of writhing spectral tendrils, emitting a constant, ear-splitting scream.

Sonic Scream(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Horror targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The target takes SD damage and is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: The target takes SD damage. On 16+: The target takes half damage.

name: Sludge Monstrosity
description:
A large, vaguely humanoid-shaped mound of animated, toxic sludge, with bones and broken weapons half-submerged in its form.

Corrosive Touch(Passive) When this creature hits with a melee attack, the target's armor is reduced by 1 for the rest of the combat.
Sludge Bomb(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll to hurl sludge at a target within 4 squares. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals MD acid damage. On 16+: It deals MD acid damage and the target is Slowed for 1 round.

name: Bone Collector
description:
A macabre, skeletal creature with four long, spider-like legs made of bone, carrying a large, open sack from which it hurls skulls and femurs.

Bone Toss(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals HD damage. On 16+: It deals HD damage and the target is Weakened for 1 round.

name: Dark Cleric
description:
A gaunt, pale-skinned priest in shadowy vestments, who twists holy magic into a dark, vampiric force that harms and heals in equal measure.

Vampiric Touch(Active, Costs 3 MP) The Cleric targets a character within melee. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The target takes MD magical damage, and the Cleric heals for the same amount. On 9-15: The target takes MD damage, and the Cleric heals for half. On 16+: The target takes half damage.

name: Forsaken Crossbowman
description:
A skeletal archer with glowing purple eyes, wielding a heavy, repeating crossbow that fires bolts imbued with shadow magic.

Black Arrow(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (10 squares). On 1-8: The arrow misses. On 9-15: Deals MD shadow damage. On 16+: Deals MD shadow damage and the target is Weakened for 1 round.

name: Plaguebat
description:
The reanimated, skeletal corpse of a giant bat, its leathery wings tattered and its body dripping with a contagious, bubbling plague.

Infected Bite(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Plaguebat bites a target. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and is Poisoned for 1d6 damage for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage and is Poisoned for 1d4 damage for 1 round. On 16+: The target takes HD damage but resists the plague.

name: Crypt Fiend
description:
A horrifying creature with the upper torso of an undead elf fused to the body of a giant, necromantic spider.

Web(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: The web misses. On 9-15: The target is Slowed for 2 rounds. On 16+: The target is Immobilized for 2 rounds.
Burrow(Active) The Fiend becomes untargetable until the start of its next turn.

name: Necromancer Acolyte
description:
A pale, gaunt human in dark robes, clutching a tome bound in flayed skin and chanting in a low, guttural language.

Raise Skeletons(Active, Costs 4 MP) Make a roll to summon undead. On 1-8: The spell fails. On 9-15: Summons one Skeleton Archer. On 16+: Summons two Skeleton Archers.
Cripple(Active, Costs 2 MP) A target must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: The target takes 1d4 MD and is Weakened for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The target resists the curse.

name: Frost Wyrm Whelp
description:
The reanimated skeletal remains of a small dragon, its bones held together by arcs of freezing, necrotic energy and its eyes burning with cold, blue light.

Frost Breath(Active, Costs 3 MP) Make a roll to breathe a cone of frost. On 1-8: The breath is just cold air. On 9-15: All characters in a 4-square cone take MD cold damage. On 16+: All characters in a 4-square cone take MD cold damage and are Slowed for 2 rounds.

name: Death Knight Initiate
description:
A fallen warrior raised into undeath, their eyes glowing with an unholy blue light and their voice echoing with the cold of the grave as they wield a rune-etched blade.

Death Coil(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals MD necrotic damage to a living target or heals an Undead target for MD. On 16+: It deals MD+3 necrotic damage to a living target or heals an Undead target for MD+3.
Icy Touch(Active, Costs 1 MP) A melee attack that deals HD damage. The target must Defy Danger (COS) or be Slowed for 1 round.

name: Dire Wolf Alpha
description:
A massive, battle-scarred wolf the size of a pony, its fur matted with blood and its eyes glowing with cunning intelligence and malice.

Pack Leader's Howl(Active, Costs 2 SP) Make a roll to howl. On 1-8: The howl is unheard. On 9-15: One allied Beast within 5 squares gains +3 forward on their next attack. On 16+: All allied Beasts within 5 squares gain advantage on their next attack.
Hamstring(Active, Costs 1 HP) A target must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: They take HD damage and are Slowed for 2 rounds. On 9-15: They take HD damage. On 16+: They avoid the attack.

name: Grave-Stag
description:
The skeletal remains of a great stag, its massive antlers tangled with thorny vines and its bones stained with a sickly, phosphorescent moss.

Overgrowth(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to summon vines. On 1-8: The spell fails. On 9-15: A 2-square area within 5 squares becomes difficult terrain. On 16+: A 3-square area becomes difficult terrain and any enemy starting their turn there is Slowed for 1 round.

name: Feral Cave Bear
description:
A colossal bear with matted, blood-stained fur, whose claws are the size of daggers and whose roar can shake stones loose from the ceiling.

Maul(Active, Costs 3 HP) The Bear attacks a target. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The character is hit for x2HD damage and is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: The character is hit for x2HD damage. On 16+: The character takes half damage.

name: Dire Boar
description:
An enormous, foul-tempered boar with shaggy black fur, tusks as long as short swords, and a hide thick enough to turn aside arrows.

Gore(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll to charge a target. On 1-8: The charge is clumsy and the Boar is Weakened for 1 round. On 9-15: The Boar moves up to its speed in a straight line and attacks for HD damage. On 16+: The Boar moves up to its speed and attacks for x2HD damage, inflicting Bleeding for 1d6 for 1 round.

name: Giant Serpent
description:
A constrictor snake as thick as a tree trunk, with emerald green scales and fangs that drip with a paralytic venom.

Constrict(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Serpent attempts to grapple a target. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The character is grappled and Immobilized, taking HD damage at the start of their turn until they escape. On 9-15: The character is Immobilized for 1 round. On 16+: The character evades the coils.

name: Rock-Borer Badger
description:
A badger the size of a small boulder with iron-like claws and a furious temperament, capable of chewing through solid rock to get to its prey.

Burrowing Ambush(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Badger burrows underground. On its next turn, it can emerge under any character and make an attack with advantage that deals HD+2 damage.
Relentless Fury(Passive) If this creature is not Stunned or Immobilized, it can make a second move action on its turn.

name: Glass-Wing Wasp
description:
A horse-sized wasp with a black and yellow abdomen, whose wings are made of razor-sharp, almost invisible crystal that hum with a high-frequency vibration.

Sonic Buzz(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Wasp targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The character is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: The character is Deafened for 2 rounds. On 16+: The character withstands the noise.

name: Dire Bat
description:
A monstrous bat with a wingspan of over fifteen feet and a mouth full of needle-like teeth, capable of draining the life from its victims.

Life Drain(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: It misses. On 9-15: It deals HD damage and heals for half the amount dealt. On 16+: It deals HD damage and heals for the full amount dealt.

name: Emperor Scorpion
description:
An enormous black scorpion the size of a cart, with massive pincers and a tail tipped with a stinger dripping with potent neurotoxin.

Pincer Crush(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Scorpion attacks a target. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The target is grappled and Immobilized, taking HD damage at the start of their turn until they escape. On 9-15: The target is grappled and Immobilized for 1 round. On 16+: The character avoids the pincers.

name: Plains Strider
description:
A large, two-legged flightless bird with powerful, muscular legs and a sharp, cruel beak, capable of running down prey with terrifying speed.

Sprint(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Strider can use its action to move up to double its speed.
Furious Peck(Passive) This creature's HD attacks are Brutal (roll damage twice and take the best result).

name: Dire Gorilla
description:
A colossal silverback gorilla with arms as thick as tree trunks and an intelligent, furious gaze, who pounds its chest with a thunderous roar.

Frenzied Rage(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: Deals HD damage. On 9-15: Deals HD damage and the Gorilla can make another attack. On 16+: Deals HD damage and the Gorilla can make two more attacks.

name: Blink Dog
description:
A lean, intelligent canine with a sleek, blue-grey coat that seems to flicker in and out of existence as it moves.

Blink(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to teleport. On 1-8: The dog teleports 1d4 squares in a random direction. On 9-15: It teleports to an empty square within 4 squares. On 16+: It teleports to an empty square within 6 squares and its next attack has advantage.

name: Giant Eagle
description:
A majestic eagle with a wingspan of over thirty feet, whose feathers are the color of burnished gold and whose eyes hold an ancient, noble intelligence.

Wing Attack(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Eagle attacks a target. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and is Pushed 2 squares. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage and is Pushed 1 square. On 16+: The character stands firm and takes half damage.

name: Dire Badger
description:
A house-sized badger with a thick, striped hide, a furious disposition, and claws that can rend steel as easily as soil.

Rage(Passive) When this creature takes damage, its next melee attack deals +HD damage.
Burrow(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Badger can move through earth at half its speed, leaving a tunnel.

name: Phase Spiderling
description:
A dog-sized spider whose body flickers between the material and ethereal planes, allowing it to bypass physical barriers and deliver a venomous bite from nowhere.

Ethereal Jaunt(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to shift planes. On 1-8: The shift fails. On 9-15: It becomes incorporeal for 1 round, able to move through walls and taking half damage from physical sources. On 16+: It becomes incorporeal for 2 rounds.

name: Dire Wolverine
description:
A wolverine the size of a bear, its shaggy fur matted with the blood of its enemies, which enters a near-unstoppable rage when wounded.

Frenzied Rage(Passive) While below half HP, this creature is immune to the Stunned and Frightened conditions.
Cornered Fury(Active, Costs 3 HP) If it is adjacent to 2 or more enemies, it can attack all adjacent enemies simultaneously.

name: Giant Leech
description:
An unnervingly large, segmented, black leech with a circular, tooth-lined maw that latches on to drain the lifeblood of its prey.

Blood Drain(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Leech attacks a target. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The target is latched onto, taking 1d4 HD at the start of their turn, and the Leech heals for that amount. On 9-15: The attack deals 1d4 HD and the Leech heals for that amount. On 16+: The attack misses.

name: Dire Ram
description:
A massive mountain ram with a thick, shaggy coat and two enormous, spiraling horns made of solid, iron-like bone.

Headbutt(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll to charge a target. On 1-8: The charge misses and the Ram is Weakened for 1 round. On 9-15: It hits, dealing x2HD damage. On 16+: It hits, dealing x2HD damage and the target is Stunned for 1 round.

name: Razorback Crocodile
description:
A gargantuan crocodile with dark, armored scales and a row of sharp, bony spines along its back that can be launched like projectiles.

Death Roll(Active, Costs 2 HP) If the Crocodile has a character grappled, it can use this action. The character takes x2HD damage and is Bleeding for 1d6 damage for 2 rounds.
Spine Volley(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll to fire spines. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: Deals HD damage to one target within 5 squares. On 16+: Deals HD damage to up to three targets within 5 squares.

name: Saber-Toothed Tiger
description:
A powerful great cat with a striped coat, a muscular build, and two enormous, dagger-like canine teeth that jut down from its upper jaw.

Pounce(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Tiger moves up to its speed and makes an attack at the end of the movement. If it moved at least 4 squares, the attack deals +2 damage and the target is knocked prone.
Stealthy(Passive) Has advantage on all rolls to hide in natural terrain.

name: Lesser Fire Elemental
description:
A swirling vortex of living flame with a vaguely humanoid shape and two burning motes for eyes, leaving a trail of scorched earth in its wake.

Fire Bolt(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals MD fire damage. On 16+: It deals MD fire damage and the target is Burning for 1d4 damage for 1 round.
Fiery Aura(Passive) Any character that ends their turn adjacent to the elemental takes 1d4 MD fire damage.

name: Lesser Water Elemental
description:
A vaguely humanoid shape formed from a constantly churning wave of pure, animated water.

Douse(Active, Costs 1 MP) The elemental targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character is soaked and becomes Slowed for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character is Slowed for 1 round. On 16+: The character avoids the water.
Soothing Mist(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to heal an allied elemental within 4 squares. On 1-8: The heal fails. On 9-15: It heals for 1d6. On 16+: It heals for MD.

name: Lesser Earth Elemental
description:
A slow, brutish humanoid made of jagged, living rock and soil, with two massive fists of solid granite.

Earthbind(Active, Costs 2 MP) The elemental targets a character within 5 squares. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character is Immobilized for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character is Slowed for 1 round. On 16+: The character evades the grasping earth.
Stony Skin(Passive) This creature has a permanent +1 Armor.

name: Lesser Air Elemental
description:
A barely visible, humanoid-shaped whirlwind of dust and debris, its form constantly shifting and reforming as it glides silently across the ground.

Cyclone(Active, Costs 2 MP) The elemental targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The character is Pushed 2 squares and is Weakened for 1 round. On 9-15: The character is Pushed 1 square. On 16+: The character stands firm.

name: Magma Rager
description:
A hulking brute made of superheated magma, whose lower body is a churning pool and whose upper body is a vaguely humanoid shape with two massive, molten fists.

Volatile Form(Passive) This creature has only 1 HP, but deals x4HD damage with its melee attacks.

name: Sand Scuttler
description:
A scorpion-like creature made entirely of magically animated, swirling sand, with two powerful pincers and a tail that lashes out with blinding dust.

Sand Sting(Active, Costs 1 MP) The Scuttler targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target is Blinded for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target is Blinded for 1 round. On 16+: The character avoids the dust cloud.

name: Storm Forged-Revenant
description:
A humanoid warrior forged from a living thunderstorm, its body crackling with lightning and its eyes glowing with pure, white-hot energy as it wields a greatsword made of solidified thunder.

Lightning Crash(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack deals HD damage. On 9-15: The attack deals HD + MD lightning damage. On 16+: The attack deals HD + MD lightning damage and the target is Stunned for 1 round.

name: Tidal Guardian
description:
A hulking, crab-like elemental made of coral and seafoam, its massive pincers capable of creating powerful whirlpools.

Whirlpool(Active, Costs 3 MP) The Guardian targets a character within 5 squares. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The target is Pulled 2 squares and is Immobilized for 1 round. On 9-15: The target is Pulled 1 square. On 16+: The character resists the pull.

name: Frost Nymph
description:
A beautiful, graceful humanoid figure sculpted from pure, blue-white ice, who glides across the ground leaving a trail of frost in her wake.

Freezing Touch(Active, Costs 1 MP) A target must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The target takes MD cold damage and is Immobilized for 1 round. On 9-15: The target takes MD cold damage and is Slowed for 1 round. On 16+: The target takes half damage.

name: Geode Lord
description:
A massive, slow-moving elemental whose outer shell is rough, grey rock, but the cracks in its body reveal a hollow interior lined with shimmering, purple amethyst crystals.

Crystal Shards(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals MD magical damage. On 16+: It deals MD magical damage and the target is Bleeding for 1d4 damage for 1 round.
Resistant Shell(Passive) All HD damage this creature takes is reduced by 1.

name: Cinder Sprite
description:
A tiny, mischievous humanoid made of living embers and smoke that flits through the air, leaving a trail of harmless sparks.

Flash Fire(Active, Costs 1 MP) The Sprite targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character is Blinded for 1 round. On 9-15: The character is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character is unaffected.

name: Living Mudslide
description:
A slow-moving, amorphous blob of thick, churning mud that can alter its shape to pull enemies into its suffocating mass.

Muddy Grasp(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Mudslide targets a character within 3 squares. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The character is Immobilized for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character is Slowed for 2 rounds. On 16+: The character breaks free.

name: Zephyr Noble
description:
A tall, elegant humanoid whose body is made of gracefully swirling white clouds and whose face is a calm, featureless mask of condensed air.

Tailwind(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to summon a wind. On 1-8: The spell fails. On 9-15: One allied creature's speed is doubled for 1 round. On 16+: All allied creatures' speeds are doubled for 1 round.

name: Obsidian Spike
description:
A levitating, perfectly smooth shard of black volcanic glass that hums with a low, resonant frequency and can fire smaller, razor-sharp splinters.

Shard Volley(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll to fire shards in a 4-square cone. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: All targets in the cone take 1d6 HD. On 16+: All targets in the cone take 1d6 HD and are Bleeding for 1d4 for 1 round.

name: Steam Mephit
description:
A small, imp-like creature made of superheated steam, which cackles as it scalds its enemies before exploding in a final, blinding cloud.

Scalding Blast(Active, Costs 1 MP) The Mephit targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target takes MD fire damage. On 9-15: The target takes half damage. On 16+: The character avoids the steam.
Death Burst(Passive) When this creature is defeated, all adjacent characters are Blinded for 1 round.

name: Living Spellbook
description:
An ancient, leather-bound tome that flutters through the air on its own pages, its cover dominated by a single, large, magically glowing eye.

Cast Random Spell(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to cast a spell. On 1-8: It casts a weak 'Ember' (1d4 MD). On 9-15: It casts 'Frostbolt' (deals MD cold damage, target is Slowed for 1 round). On 16+: It casts 'Lightning Bolt' (deals x2MD lightning damage).

name: Chain Devil Spawn
description:
A humanoid figure made entirely of shifting, clanking, rusted chains, with two glowing red lights in the gaps that serve as its eyes.

Chain Lash(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Spawn attacks a target within 3 squares. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and is Immobilized for 1 round. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage. On 16+: The attack is dodged.

name: Phoenix Hatchling
description:
A small, brilliant bird made of pure, golden-red fire that leaves a trail of harmless, floating embers as it flies.

Rebirth(Passive) The first time this creature is defeated, it is reborn at the start of its next turn with half of its maximum HP.
Flame Burst(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (7 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: Deals MD fire damage. On 16+: Deals MD fire damage and the target is Burning for 1d4 for 1 round.

name: Salamander Whelp
description:
A lithe, serpentine lizard whose lower body is a coil of living flame and whose upper torso wields a small, wickedly sharp spear forged from obsidian.

Heat Metal(Active, Costs 2 MP) The Whelp targets a character wearing metal armor. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The character takes MD fire damage and is Weakened for 1 round. On 9-15: The character takes MD fire damage. On 16+: The character is unaffected.

name: Gazer Familiar
description:
A small, floating eyeball held aloft by two tiny, bat-like wings, with a mouth full of needle-sharp teeth just below the iris.

Bite(Active, Costs 1 HP) A melee attack that deals HD damage.
Paralyzing Gaze(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to stare at a target within 4 squares. On 1-8: The gaze has no effect. On 9-15: The target is Slowed for 1 round. On 16+: The target is Stunned for 1 round.

name: SparkMite
description:
A small, beetle-like creature with a metallic blue carapace and two large antennae that constantly crackle with bright yellow static electricity.

Tiny Spark(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (5 squares). On 1-8: The spark fizzles out. On 9-15: It deals 1d4 MD lightning damage. On 16+: It deals 1d4 MD lightning damage and the target is Weakened for 1 round.

name: Gritmon
description:
A stout, bipedal creature made of rough, brown rock, with two oversized, boulder-like fists and a determined, blocky face.

Rock Fist(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals HD damage. On 16+: The attack deals HD+2 damage and ignores 1 point of Armor.

name: AquaPup
description:
A small, playful seal-like creature with blue fur, large innocent eyes, and two fin-like ears that it uses to swim through the air.

Bubble Breath(Active, Costs 1 MP) The AquaPup targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target is hit and is Weakened for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character avoids the bubbles.

name: PyroPetal
description:
A sentient, walking flower whose four large, tulip-like petals are perpetually wreathed in a gentle, harmless-looking flame.

Pepper Breath(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (5 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals MD fire damage. On 16+: It deals MD fire damage and the target is Burning for 1d4 for 1 round.

name: CutterMoth
description:
A large, green caterpillar-like creature with two oversized, scythe-like antennae and an armoured, segmented body.

Razor Wind(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (4 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: Deals HD damage to one target. On 16+: Deals HD damage to all targets in a 3-square line.

name: GearBit
description:
A tiny, floating construct made of a single, large, rotating gear for a body, with two smaller gears for eyes and a perpetually cheerful expression.

Gear Shot(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: The shot misses. On 9-15: It deals HD-2 damage. On 16+: It deals HD-2 damage and reduces the target's armor by 1 for 1 round.
Self-Repair(Active) Spends its action to heal for 1d4 HP.

name: SludgeSlime
description:
A small, quivering blob of purple, toxic goo with two large, sad-looking yellow eyes.

Weakening Touch(Active) The Slime touches a character. The player must Defy Danger (COS). On 1-8: The target is Weakened for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character resists the effect.

name: CryoPenguin
description:
A small penguin-like creature with sleek blue and white feathers, a sharp, golden beak, and two determined-looking eyes.

Ice Slide(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll to slide on a sheet of ice. On 1-8: It slides 1d4 squares in a random direction. On 9-15: It moves up to its speed in a straight line and deals HD damage to the first enemy it hits. On 16+: It moves up to double its speed in a straight line and deals HD damage to the first enemy it hits.

name: GloomShroom
description:
A walking mushroom with a large, drooping purple cap covered in dark spots, and a face with perpetually drowsy, half-closed eyes.

Noxious Spores(Active, Costs 2 MP) The GloomShroom targets a character within 3 squares. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The target is Poisoned for 1d4 MD for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target is Weakened for 2 rounds. On 16+: The character holds their breath and is unaffected.

name: BatBit
description:
A small, fuzzy bat-like creature with enormous ears and a mouth that opens impossibly wide to emit a disorienting sonic screech.

Supersonic Screech(Active, Costs 2 SP) The BatBit targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The character is Confused for 1 round. On 9-15: The character is Deafened for 2 rounds. On 16+: The character withstands the screech.

name: GaboWolf
description:
A small, bipedal wolf-like creature wearing a fur pelt, with a sharp yellow horn on its forehead and a fiery spirit.

Little Horn(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals HD damage. On 16+: It deals HD damage and the target is Weakened for 1 round.
Small Fire(Active, Costs 1 MP) Ranged attack (4 squares) that deals MD fire damage.

name: ArmorDillo
description:
A small armadillo-like creature whose back is covered in thick, interlocking yellow plates, which it can curl into a near-impenetrable defensive ball.

Defense Curl(Active) The ArmorDillo gains +3 Armor until its next turn, but its speed becomes 1.
Rollout(Active, Costs 1 HP) Deals HD damage. If used again on the next turn, its damage increases by +1, stacking up to 5 times.

name: DataWorm
description:
A tiny, green, caterpillar-like creature with a large, friendly digital face on its head and two antennae that end in small, sparking plugs.

Data String Shot(Active, Costs 1 MP) A target within 4 squares must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target is Immobilized for 1 round. On 9-15: The target is Slowed for 2 rounds. On 16+: The character avoids the string.

name: HolyAngemonk
description:
A small, cute, hamster-like creature with two tiny, white feathered wings and a golden ring floating above its head like a halo.

Minor Heal(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to heal an ally within 5 squares. On 1-8: The heal is weak, restoring 1d4 HP. On 9-15: It restores 1d8 HP. On 16+: It restores MD+2 HP.

name: ImpmonImp
description:
A small, bipedal purple creature with a mischievous grin, long pointed ears, a red scarf, and white gloves, who snaps his fingers to create small bursts of dark fire.

Night Fire(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals MD fire damage. On 16+: It deals MD fire damage and the target is Weakened for 1 round.

name: TerraPinch
description:
A small, crab-like construct with a hard, metallic shell and two powerful drills for claws.

Drill Peck(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: Deals HD damage. On 16+: Deals HD damage and ignores 2 points of Armor.

name: AeroHawk
description:
A small, fierce bird of prey with brown and white feathers and an incredibly sharp beak, that flies with sharp, angular movements.

Wing Attack(Active, Costs 1 HP) The AeroHawk attacks a target. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and is Pushed 1 square. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage. On 16+: The target avoids the attack.

name: Gator-Spark
description:
A small, bipedal alligator with blue scales and a yellow underbelly, whose powerful jaws crackle with contained electrical energy.

Sparking Bite(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Gator-Spark bites a target. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage. On 16+: The character breaks free from the bite.

name: WeedMon
description:
A strange, walking plant with a blue, bulbous body, two root-like feet, and two long, whip-like green vines for arms.

Vine Lash(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack with Reach (3 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals HD damage. On 16+: It deals HD damage and the target is Slowed for 1 round.

name: Psyche-Ball
description:
A levitating, perfectly spherical creature with a single, large, unblinking eye and a perpetually confused expression.

Confusion Ray(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Psyche-Ball stares at a target within 5 squares. The player must Defy Danger (INT). On 1-8: The target is Confused for 1 round. On 9-15: The target is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character shakes off the mental assault.

name: Chomper
description:
A small, bipedal dinosaur-like creature with orange skin, a large head, and an even larger mouth full of surprisingly sharp teeth.

Mighty Bite(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Chomper bites a target. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target takes HD+2 damage. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage. On 16+: The target avoids the bite.

name: IceMite
description:
A tiny, floating ball of white fur with two large, curious blue eyes, that constantly exhales a visible stream of freezing cold air.

Frost Breath(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to breathe frost in a 3-square cone. On 1-8: A harmless cold breeze. On 9-15: All targets in the cone are Slowed for 1 round. On 16+: All targets in the cone take 1d4 MD cold damage and are Slowed for 2 rounds.

name: DrillBit
description:
A small, brown, mole-like beast with a hardened, metallic drill for a nose and two powerful, shovel-like claws.

Drill Rush(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals HD damage. On 16+: It deals HD damage and ignores all armor for this attack.
Dig(Active) The DrillBit can spend its action to become untargetable until the start of its next turn.

name: ShadowPup
description:
A small, playful puppy-like creature made of solidified shadow, with long, floppy ears and two glowing red dots for eyes.

Menacing Howl(Active, Costs 1 SP) The ShadowPup targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The target is Frightened for 1 round. On 9-15: The target is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character is unaffected by the cute howl.

name: ToxiBud
description:
A small, walking plant bulb with two stubby root-legs, two vine-arms, and a large, closed flower bud for a head that constantly drips a foul-smelling purple liquid.

Poison Powder(Active, Costs 2 MP) The ToxiBud targets a character within 3 squares. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The target is Poisoned for 1d6 MD for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target is Poisoned for 1d4 MD for 1 round. On 16+: The character avoids the powder.

name: Pummel-Bot
description:
A small, boxy, bipedal robot with a simple digital face and two ridiculously oversized, piston-powered fists.

Mega Punch(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Pummel-Bot attacks a target. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage. On 16+: The character parries the punch.

name: FeatherDuster
description:
A small, brown, sparrow-like bird whose wings are disproportionately large, allowing it to whip up small, powerful gusts of wind.

Gust(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll to create a gust of wind. On 1-8: A weak breeze does nothing. On 9-15: A single target within 4 squares is Pushed 1 square. On 16+: All targets in a 3-square cone are Pushed 1 square.

name: JellyWisp
description:
A small, translucent blue jellyfish that floats through the air, its two long tentacles sparking with bio-electricity.

Static Veil(Passive) Any character who hits the JellyWisp with a melee attack takes 1d4 MD lightning damage.
Constrict(Active, Costs 1 MP) A target must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target is grappled and Slowed for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target is Slowed for 1 round. On 16+: The character avoids the tentacles.

name: GummySlug
description:
A cute, pink, slug-like creature with two simple dot eyes and a friendly smile, whose body is made of a strangely resilient, rubbery substance.

Bide(Active) The GummySlug spends its turn doing nothing. On its next turn, it can unleash the stored energy as its action, dealing damage to one target equal to the total damage it took since its last turn.

name: TattlerBat
description:
A fuzzy, black, bat-like creature with one large, cyclopean eye and two absolutely enormous ears that can pinpoint the slightest sound.

Foresight(Active, Costs 2 SP) Make a roll to discern a target's weakness. On 1-8: The TattlerBat misinterprets the signs. On 9-15: It learns one weakness (e.g., fire, ice) of the target. On 16+: It learns one weakness and the next attack exploiting that weakness deals +HD damage.

name: CandleMonk
description:
A small, floating creature whose body is a simple white candle, with two tiny arms and a large, serene flame for a head that radiates a calming warmth.

Flash(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll to create a bright flash. On 1-8: It fails. On 9-15: One target within 3 squares is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: All creatures within 2 squares are Blinded for 1 round.

name: BoxerCrab
description:
A bipedal crab-like creature with a tough red shell, that stands in a boxer's stance and wields its two oversized pincers like a pair of boxing gloves.

Bullet Punch(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals HD damage. On 16+: It deals HD damage and the BoxerCrab may make an additional Punch attack as a free action.

name: SpikeBall
description:
A perfectly spherical robot made of interlocking steel plates, from which it can extend or retract dozens of sharp, wicked-looking spikes.

Spiky Shield(Active) The SpikeBall gains +2 Armor until its next turn. While this is active, any creature that hits it with a melee attack takes 1d4 HD damage.

name: MiniSaurus
description:
A tiny, bipedal dinosaur with orange scales and a perpetually grumpy expression, whose tail is tipped with a small, flickering flame.

Small Flame(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (5 squares). On 1-8: The flame goes out. On 9-15: It deals MD fire damage. On 16+: It deals MD fire damage and the target is Burning for 1d4 for 1 round.

name: Aqua-Rat
description:
A small, blue, bipedal rodent with a coiled tail, large red eyes, and a white belly, capable of shooting surprisingly powerful jets of water from its mouth.

Water Gun(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals MD water damage. On 16+: It deals MD water damage and the target is Pushed 1 square.

name: Seedling
description:
A small, walking turquoise-colored plant bulb with two small leaves for arms and a large, unopened green seed pod on its back.

Solar Beam(Active, Costs 3 MP) The Seedling spends its action gathering sunlight. On its next turn, it can unleash a powerful beam as a free action. Make a roll for the attack (8 squares). On 1-8: It deals MD magical damage. On 9-15: It deals x2MD magical damage. On 16+: It deals x3MD magical damage.

name: Proto-Gryphon
description:
A small, quadrupedal creature with the furry hindquarters of a lion cub and the feathered head and taloned forelimbs of a baby eagle.

Sand Attack(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Proto-Gryphon kicks sand at a target. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target is Blinded for 1 round. On 9-15: The target is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character shields their eyes.

name: GhostlyPillow
description:
A creature that looks exactly like a floating, tattered white pillow with two simple black button eyes and a mischievous, stitched-on grin.

Nightmare(Active, Costs 2 SP) The GhostlyPillow targets a sleeping (Stunned) character. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The target takes SD damage and remains asleep. On 9-15: The target takes half SD damage and wakes up. On 16+: The target wakes up and takes no damage.

name: Gear-Spider
description:
A small, eight-legged spider made of interlocking brass gears and copper wires, its multiple red-lens eyes glowing with a cold, calculating light.

String Shot(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll to shoot a sticky wire at a target within 5 squares. On 1-8: The shot misses. On 9-15: The target is Slowed for 2 rounds. On 16+: The target is Immobilized for 1 round.

name: Psyche-Egg
description:
A group of six, levitating, pink-shelled eggs that hover in a tight cluster, each one having a slightly different crack that reveals a single, large, expressive eye.

Reflect(Active, Costs 3 MP) The Psyche-Egg prepares a barrier. The next time it is targeted by a single-target MD attack, it takes no damage and the attacker takes the damage instead.
Egg Bomb(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (4 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals HD psychic damage. On 16+: It deals HD psychic damage and the target is Confused for 1 round.

name: Griffin Hatchling
description:
A small, feisty griffin with the downy feathers of a chick on its eagle head and the clumsy, oversized paws of a lion cub.

Peck(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8 or 9-15: Deals HD damage. On 16+: Deals HD damage and the target is Weakened for 1 round.
Gust(Active, Costs 1 MP) The Hatchling flaps its wings at a target within 3 squares. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The character is Pushed 2 squares. On 9-15: The character is Pushed 1 square. On 16+: The character stands firm.

name: Stone Golemite
description:
A small, floating boulder with two detached, smaller rocks that serve as crude, hovering fists.

Rock Throw(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (5 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals HD damage. On 16+: The attack deals HD+2 damage.
Harden(Active) The Golemite gains +2 Armor until its next turn.

name: Basilisk Whelp
description:
A young, serpentine lizard with sickly green scales and a hood that flares when it feels threatened, revealing two large, hypnotic eye-spots.

Paralyzing Gaze(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Whelp glares at a target within 4 squares. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The character is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: The character is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character averts their eyes and is unaffected.

name: Noctule Pup
description:
A small, spherical creature covered in fuzzy purple fur, with two large, leathery wings but no visible eyes, navigating entirely by sound.

Leech Life(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The attack deals HD damage, and the Noctule heals for half that amount. On 16+: The attack deals HD damage, and the Noctule heals for the full amount.

name: Myconid Sprout
description:
A tiny, bipedal mushroom-person with a blue cap dotted with white spots, whose face is a pair of simple, black, unblinking eyes.

Sleep Spores(Active, Costs 2 MP) The Sprout releases spores. All adjacent characters must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: They fall asleep and are Stunned until they take damage. On 9-15: They are Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: They are unaffected.

name: Will-o'-Wisp
description:
A floating sphere of spectral purple fire with a mischievous, grinning face that flickers within the flames.

Curse(Active, Costs 3 SP) The Wisp curses a target within 5 squares. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The character takes 1d6 MD at the start of their next 2 turns. On 9-15: The character takes 1d6 MD at the start of their next turn. On 16+: The curse fails.
Incorporeal(Passive) Takes half damage from non-magical physical sources (HD).

name: Rock Drake
description:
A colossal serpent composed of a long chain of massive, interconnected grey boulders that grind together as it moves.

Rock Tomb(Active, Costs 3 HP) Make a roll to summon rocks around a target within 7 squares. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: The target is surrounded by difficult terrain. On 16+: The target is Immobilized for 2 rounds.
Slam(Active, Costs 1 HP) A melee attack that deals HD+3 damage.

name: River Hydra Whelp
description:
A small, serpentine water dragon with two heads, fins for ears, and a mischievous expression.

Dual Water Gun(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: One jet of water misses. On 9-15: One jet hits for MD water damage. On 16+: Both jets hit, dealing x2MD water damage to one or two targets.
Smokescreen(Active, Costs 1 MP) Creates a 2x2 area of dense ink that heavily obscures vision.

name: Arcane Homunculus
description:
A magically-created humanoid with smooth grey skin, a slender feline-like body, and a long, thin tail, whose large purple eyes glow with immense psychic power.

Psyshock(Active, Costs 3 MP) The Homunculus attacks a target's mind within 8 squares. The player must Defy Danger (INT). On 1-8: The target takes x2MD psychic damage. On 9-15: The target takes MD psychic damage. On 16+: The target takes half MD damage.
Barrier(Active, Costs 2 MP) Gains +2 Armor until its next turn.

name: Cockatrice Chick
description:
A flightless, two-headed bird covered in shaggy brown feathers, each head constantly pecking and squabbling with the other.

Fury Attack(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: Makes two attacks, each for HD damage. On 16+: Makes four attacks, each for HD damage.
Petrifying Peck(Passive) On a critical hit, the target is Stunned for 1 round.

name: Minotaur Runt
description:
A young, powerfully built humanoid with the head of a bull, a snarling snout, and two short, sharp horns, who paws the ground impatiently.

Gore(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Minotaur charges a target. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target takes x2HD damage and is Pushed 2 squares. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage. On 16+: The character dodges completely.

name: Harpy Fledgling
description:
A creature with the torso and head of a gaunt woman, but with large, feathery wings instead of arms and powerful, raptor-like talons for feet.

Piercing Shriek(Active, Costs 2 SP) Make a roll to screech. On 1-8: A single target within 5 squares is Weakened for 1 round. On 9-15: All targets in a 4-square cone are Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: All targets in a 4-square cone are Weakened for 2 rounds.

name: Centaur Scout
description:
A creature with the torso of a muscular human seamlessly joined to the powerful, four-legged body of a wild horse, carrying a sturdy shortbow.

Gallop and Shoot(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Centaur moves up to its speed and makes a ranged attack. Make a roll. On 1-8: The shot misses. On 9-15: The shot deals HD damage. On 16+: The shot deals HD+2 damage.

name: Dryad Sapling
description:
A shy, child-like humanoid whose skin is the texture of smooth, pale birch bark and whose hair is a cascade of green leaves and small white flowers.

Enthralling Presence(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Dryad targets a character within 4 squares. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The character is Charmed for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character resists the fey glamour.

name: Gorgon Calf
description:
A young but powerful bull whose hide is made of overlapping plates of verdigris-coated bronze, which snorts clouds of thick, greenish vapor.

Petrifying Breath(Active, Costs 3 MP) Make a roll to breathe a cone of gas. On 1-8: The breath is just vapor. On 9-15: All characters in a 3-square cone are Slowed for 2 rounds. On 16+: All characters in a 3-square cone are Stunned for 1 round.

name: Naga Spell-Serpent
description:
A creature with the torso of a lithe, blue-skinned humanoid and the lower body of a great, coiling serpent, its four arms each weaving a different water spell.

Tidal Lash(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to unleash a wave in a 4-square cone. On 1-8: The wave is a weak splash. On 9-15: All targets in the cone take 1d6 MD water damage. On 16+: All targets in the cone take 1d6 MD water damage and are Pushed 2 squares.

name: Kobold Trap-Maker
description:
A small, scaly, reptilian humanoid with a dog-like snout and a perpetually nervous, yipping demeanor, clutching a bag of springs, rope, and sharp objects.

Scrap Trap(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll to set a trap in an adjacent square. On 1-8: The trap springs on the Kobold, who becomes Immobilized for 1 round. On 9-15: It creates a simple caltrop trap, making the square difficult terrain. On 16+: It creates a spring-loaded net; the next creature to enter the square is Immobilized for 2 rounds.

name: Satyr Piper
description:
A creature with the torso of a wiry, athletic humanoid, the furry legs and cloven hooves of a goat, and two small, curled horns on its head, playing an enchanting melody on a set of panpipes.

Pan's Pipes(Active, Costs 3 SP) Make a roll to play a melody. On 1-8: The tune is awful, and one random creature (friend or foe) is Weakened for 1 round. On 9-15: One enemy within 5 squares is Charmed for 1 round. On 16+: All enemies within 3 squares are Charmed for 1 round.

name: Wyvern Stinger
description:
A feral, two-legged dragon with a leathery hide, powerful wings, and a long, muscular tail tipped with a dripping, venomous stinger.

Sting Dive(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Wyvern dives on a target. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and is Poisoned for 1d8 MD for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage and is Poisoned for 1d6 MD for 1 round. On 16+: The target takes half HD damage and resists the poison.

name: Ettin Brute
description:
A hulking, two-headed giant with mismatched eyes and crude, ill-fitting armor, its two heads arguing with each other as each wields a massive club.

Dual Brain(Passive) This creature gets two turns in the initiative order each round (e.g., once at its initiative, and once at initiative -10).
Double Swing(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Ettin makes two separate melee attacks, which can be against the same or different targets.

name: Mystic Elf Spellcaster
description:
A serene, ethereal elf with long, flowing white hair and pointed ears, clad in simple white robes and holding a glowing wooden staff.

Mystic Heal(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to heal an ally within 6 squares. On 1-8: The heal is weak, restoring 1d4 HP. On 9-15: It restores MD. On 16+: It restores MD+5 HP.
Light's Blessing(Passive) Allied creatures adjacent to the Mystic Elf gain +1 to their Armor.

name: Horned Imp
description:
A small, mischievous purple demon with short, bat-like wings, a pointed tail, and a single, large, curved horn on its forehead.

Horn Attack(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals HD damage. On 16+: It deals HD damage and the target is Weakened for 1 round.

name: Blue-Eyes White Dragonling
description:
A majestic young dragon covered in shining white scales, with piercing blue eyes and a powerful, regal presence that commands respect.

White Lightning(Active, Costs 3 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (8 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals x2MD light damage. On 16+: It deals x2MD light damage and the target is Blinded for 1 round.

name: Feral Warrior
description:
A savage, beast-like humanoid with shaggy brown fur, powerful claws, and a wild, untamed mane, wearing a simple leather loincloth.

Claw Slash(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Feral Warrior attacks a target. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target takes HD damage and is Bleeding for 1d4 damage for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage. On 16+: The character avoids the attack.

name: Winged Kuriboh
description:
A tiny, spherical creature made of brown fluff with two large, expressive green eyes, two tiny feet, and a pair of small, white feathered wings.

Detonate(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll to explode. On 1-8: The explosion is a dud. On 9-15: All creatures in a 2-square radius take 1d4 MD. The Kuriboh is defeated. On 16+: All creatures in a 3-square radius take MD. The Kuriboh is defeated.
Multiply(Active, Costs 4 MP) Make a roll to create duplicates. On 1-8 or 9-15: Summons one copy of itself. On 16+: Summons two copies of itself. Copies have 1 HP.

name: Dark Magician Apprentice
description:
A young, female spellcaster in stylish blue and pink robes, wielding a small, spiral-tipped wand with surprising power and a determined expression.

Dark Magic Attack(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (7 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals MD magical damage. On 16+: It deals MD magical damage, and the Apprentice gains +1 to her MD for the rest of the combat.

name: Summoned Skull Fiend
description:
A towering, shadowy fiend with massive, leathery wings, a horned skull for a head, and two powerful, clawed hands that crackle with violet electricity.

Lightning Strike(Active, Costs 3 MP) The Fiend calls down lightning on a target. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The character takes x2MD lightning damage. On 9-15: The character takes MD lightning damage. On 16+: The character takes half damage.

name: Celtic Guardian
description:
A lithe elf warrior in simple green armor, wielding a single, well-balanced longsword with a determined and focused expression.

Swift Strike(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8 or 9-15: It deals HD damage. On 16+: It deals HD damage and the Guardian can immediately make a second attack.

name: Armored Zombie
description:
A shambling corpse clad in rusted, but still effective, plate armor, groaning as it mindlessly swings a heavy, notched axe.

Undying(Passive) When this creature is defeated, roll a d6. On a 4, 5, or 6, it returns to life with 1d6 HP at the start of its next turn.
Heavy Armor(Passive) All HD damage this creature takes is reduced by 1.

name: Time Wizard
description:
A small, clockwork humanoid with a large, spinning roulette wheel in its chest, whose wizened face is framed by a large, ornate helmet.

Time Roulette(Active, Costs 4 MP) Make a roll to spin the wheel. On 1-8: Time backfires; the Time Wizard is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: Time fast-forwards; one random creature (friend or foe) takes 1d10 MD. On 16+: Time rewinds; one random creature is returned to the HP total it had at the start of its last turn.

name: Red-Eyes Black Dragonling
description:
A fierce young dragon covered in sleek, black scales, with two malevolent, glowing red eyes that promise untold destructive potential.

Inferno Fire Blast(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (7 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: Deals MD+2 fire damage. On 16+: Deals x2MD fire damage.
Latent Potential(Passive) This creature's MD increases by +1 each round it remains in combat.

name: Man-Eater Bug
description:
A grotesque, oversized insect with a massive, snapping mandible and a single, large eye, which burrows underground waiting for prey to walk above it.

Trap Hole(Active, Costs 2 HP) When a creature moves adjacent to the Bug, it can use its reaction. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target takes x2HD damage. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage. On 16+: The target avoids the attack. The Bug can only use this ability while hidden or burrowed.

name: Giant Soldier of Stone
description:
A colossal humanoid figure carved from solid granite, animated by a dim, ancient magic and wielding a massive stone greatsword.

Stone Guard(Passive) This creature has a permanent +2 Armor.
Heavy Swing(Active, Costs 1 HP) A melee attack that deals HD+3 damage, but this creature cannot use its move action on the same turn.

name: Cyber Falcon
description:
A sleek, metallic bird of prey with razor-sharp steel wings and glowing red optic sensors that can fire precise laser beams from a distance.

Laser Beam(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (10 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: Deals MD magical damage. On 16+: Deals MD magical damage and ignores 1 point of Armor.

name: Toon Alligator
description:
A goofy, cartoonish bipedal alligator with oversized white gloves, big friendly eyes, and a ridiculously wide, toothy grin.

Toon Force(Passive) This creature cannot be defeated by attacks that would deal exactly enough damage to reduce its HP to 0; it is always left with 1 HP instead.
Big Chomp(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8 or 9-15: It deals HD damage. On 16+: It deals x2HD damage.

name: Relinquished Idol
description:
A small, floating creature with a single, massive, unblinking red eye and a small, stitched-up mouth, surrounded by a swirling vortex of shadowy energy.

Absorb(Active, Costs 4 MP) The Idol targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The target is absorbed, becoming a shield for the Idol. Any damage the Idol takes is dealt to the absorbed character instead. On 9-15: The target is only Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character resists the absorption.

name: Flame Swordsman
description:
A fierce warrior in ornate, red and gold armor, whose body is wreathed in flame and whose sword burns with an eternal, unholy fire.

Flame Sword(Active, Costs 1 HP) A melee attack that deals HD physical damage and MD fire damage.
Fire Resistance(Passive) This creature takes half damage from all fire-based sources.

name: Gaia the Fierce Knight
description:
A powerful knight in imposing, purple and gold armor with a fearsome horned helmet, mounted on a demonic, purple-skinned horse with glowing red eyes.

Spiral Lance Charge(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll to charge a target. On 1-8: The charge misses. On 9-15: It moves up to its speed in a straight line and attacks for x2HD damage. On 16+: It moves up to double its speed and attacks for x2HD damage, ignoring 2 points of Armor.

name: Sangan
description:
A small, round, brown furball with two big, sad-looking eyes, a smaller third eye on its forehead, and two tiny feet.

Last Grudge(Passive) When this creature is defeated, its owner may immediately search their deck for a creature with an STR of 2 or less and add it to their hand.

name: Wall of Illusion
description:
This creature appears to be a simple, featureless stone wall, until a single, massive, malevolent red eye opens in its center.

Mind Bend(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Wall targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The character becomes Confused for 1 round. On 9-15: The character becomes Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The character resists the illusion.
Imposing Presence(Passive) This creature cannot be moved by Push or Pull effects.

name: Fire-Backed Vole
description:
A sleek, blue-furred rodent with a long, powerful body, whose back is lined with a row of small vents from which jets of flame erupt when it runs.

Flame Wheel(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll to charge a target. On 1-8: The charge misses. On 9-15: It deals HD fire damage. On 16+: It deals HD fire damage and the target is Burning for 1d4 damage for 1 round.

name: Leafy Saurian
description:
A small, bipedal dinosaur-like creature with a cheerful disposition and a single, large, vibrant green leaf sprouting from its head.

Razor Leaf(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals MD magical damage. On 16+: It deals MD magical damage and has a high chance to be a critical hit.

name: Totem Owl
description:
A small, stout owl with a perpetually quizzical head-tilt, two large, round eyes, and a single, large feather sticking straight up from each eyebrow.

Foresight(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Owl targets an ally. Make a roll. On 1-8: Nothing happens. On 9-15: The next attack against that ally automatically misses. On 16+: The next two attacks against that ally automatically miss.
Hypnosis(Active, Costs 1 SP) A target must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The target is Stunned for 1 round. On 9-15: The target is Weakened for 1 round. On 16+: The target is unaffected.

name: Woolly Ram
description:
A sheep-like creature with a thick, puffy coat of white wool that constantly crackles with static electricity, and two small, curled golden horns.

Cotton Guard(Active, Costs 1 HP) The Ram gains +3 Armor until its next turn.
Static Shock(Passive) Any character who hits this creature with a melee attack takes 1d4 MD lightning damage.

name: Spinnerak
description:
A small, green spider with two large, cartoonish eyes and a single, sharp horn on its head, whose abdomen bears a constantly shifting, unsettling face-like pattern.

Poison Sting(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals HD damage and the target is Poisoned for 1d4 damage for 1 round. On 16+: It deals HD damage and the target is Poisoned for 1d6 damage for 2 rounds.

name: Gilded Bug
description:
A beetle whose entire carapace is a single, solid, impossibly durable nugget of shimmering, polished gold.

Iron Defense(Passive) This creature has a permanent +3 Armor.
Tackle(Active, Costs 1 HP) A simple melee attack that deals HD damage.

name: Aqua-Ring
description:
A graceful, blue, sea-serpent-like creature with a small draconic head, whose body is adorned with several fins that glow with a soft, restorative light.

Life Dew(Active, Costs 3 MP) Make a roll to create a healing mist. On 1-8: The mist is weak. On 9-15: It heals itself and one adjacent ally for 1d6 HP. On 16+: It heals itself and all adjacent allies for MD.

name: Spiked Urchin
description:
A floating, spherical creature covered in long, sharp, black spikes, with a single, malevolent red eye at its center.

Pain Split(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Urchin targets another creature. Both creatures' current HP totals are added together and then evenly divided between them.
Spikes(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll to scatter spikes. On 1-8: The spikes are ineffective. On 9-15: Scatters spikes in a 2x2 area, making it difficult terrain. On 16+: The area is 3x3 and any creature entering it takes 1d4 HD damage.

name: Painted Hound
description:
A strange, bipedal canine-like beast with a long, brush-like tail that it uses to paint mystical, glowing symbols in the air.

Sketch(Active, Costs 3 SP) The Hound targets one creature. Make a roll. On 1-8: The sketch is a doodle. On 9-15: It perfectly copies the target's last used ability and can use it once on its next turn. On 16+: It copies the ability and can use it twice.

name: Living Mail
description:
A bizarre, slug-like creature whose body is made of intensely hot magma, protected by a hardened shell of grey, volcanic rock.

Recover(Active, Costs 2 MP) The creature spends its action to heal. Make a roll. On 1-8: It heals for 1d4 HP. On 9-15: It heals for 1d8 HP. On 16+: It heals for 1d8+4 HP.
Overheat(Passive) Any character who hits this creature with a melee attack takes 1d4 MD fire damage.

name: Shadow Hound
description:
A terrifying, lean black hound with glowing red eyes, whose fur seems to be made of shifting, smoky shadows.

Mean Look(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Hound glares at a target. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The target is marked and cannot willingly move from their square for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The target is marked for 1 round. On 16+: The character is unaffected.
Pursuit(Active, Costs 1 HP) If a target moves away from the Hound, it may use its reaction to move up to its speed and make a melee attack.

name: Steel-Plated Pup
description:
A small, dog-like creature whose body is covered in articulated plates of grey steel, with a single, sharp horn on its head and a powerful, metallic jaw.

Metal Claw(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals HD damage. On 16+: It deals HD damage and this creature's HD is permanently increased by +1 for the rest of combat.

name: Enigmatic Relic
description:
A bizarre, floating creature composed of 26 smaller, eye-covered symbols that orbit a central, unseen core in a chaotic, indecipherable dance.

Hidden Power(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (7 squares). On 1-8: The attack deals 1d4 MD. On 9-15: It deals MD of a random element (Fire, Ice, or Lightning). On 16+: It deals MD of a random element and the target gains vulnerability to that element for 1 round.

name: Grave Robber
description:
A small, impish humanoid with long, sharp claws and a single, curved horn, who can phase through solid objects to steal valuables from tombs.

Thief(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Robber attempts to steal from a target. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: It steals a random equipped item for 2 rounds. On 9-15: It steals a random consumable item. On 16+: The attempt is thwarted.
Incorporeal(Passive) This creature can move through other creatures and objects.

name: Spiked Pinecone
description:
A large, sentient pinecone covered in razor-sharp metallic needles that it can launch at its foes with explosive force.

Explosion(Active, Costs 5 HP) Make a roll to self-destruct. On 1-8: It deals MD fire damage in a 2-square radius. On 9-15: It deals x2MD fire damage in a 3-square radius. On 16+: It deals x3MD fire damage in a 3-square radius. This creature is defeated.

name: Rock-Turtle
description:
A creature with a body made of molten magma, whose only protection is a ridiculously hard, lumpy shell made of cooled volcanic rock.

Sturdy Shell(Passive) This creature cannot be defeated by a single attack unless it deals more than double its maximum HP. Any single hit that would defeat it leaves it at 1 HP instead.

name: Sky Serpent
description:
A long, graceful, serpentine dragon covered in fluffy, cloud-like white fur, with two small, feathered wings on its head that allow it to swim through the air.

Safeguard(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll to create a protective barrier. On 1-8: The spell fails. On 9-15: It creates a barrier on one ally that negates the next condition they would receive. On 16+: It creates barriers on up to three allies.

name: Puppy Slime
description:
A small, green, slug-like dragon made of a gelatinous substance, with two large, endearing eyes and a pair of tiny, useless wings.

Absorb(Passive) This creature takes half damage from water-based MD attacks and heals for that amount instead.
Gooey Body(Passive) Any character who hits this creature with a melee attack is Slowed for 1 round.

name: Teddy Fiend
description:
A small, bipedal teddy-bear-like creature with brown fur and a crescent moon symbol on its forehead, which stands on its hind legs to fight with surprising ferocity.

Fury Swipes(Active, Costs 2 HP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It makes two attacks, each dealing HD-2 damage. On 16+: It makes five attacks, each dealing HD-2 damage.

name: Iron-Hide Rhino
description:
A massive rhinoceros whose grey hide has been replaced with thick, riveted plates of steel, giving it the appearance of a living siege engine.

Horn Drill(Active, Costs 3 HP) The Rhino charges a target. The player must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The attack hits for x3HD damage. On 9-15: It hits for x2HD damage. On 16+: The attack misses. This attack cannot be a critical hit.
Metal Plating(Passive) This creature has a permanent +2 Armor.

name: Gale Lynx
description:
A sleek, blue-furred feline with two long, streamer-like tails and small wings on its ankles that allow it to glide on currents of wind.

Aero Slash(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals MD wind damage. On 16+: It deals MD wind damage to the target and one adjacent creature.
Quick Attack(Active, Costs 1 HP) A melee attack that deals HD damage. This creature may move 3 squares for free after the attack.

name: Spore-Tailed Fox
description:
A clever red fox whose bushy tail has been replaced by a large, puffball mushroom that releases clouds of debilitating spores when threatened.

Poison Spores(Active, Costs 2 MP) The fox targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (CON). On 1-8: The character is Poisoned for 1d6 damage for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character is Poisoned for 1d4 damage for 1 round. On 16+: The character resists the spores.

name: Runic Bear Cub
description:
A playful bear cub whose brown fur is covered in swirling, glowing orange runes that spark with primal energy.

Empowered Maul(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8: The attack deals HD damage. On 9-15: The attack deals HD+MD damage. On 16+: The attack deals HD+MD damage and the target is Weakened for 1 round.

name: Shadow Wisp
description:
A floating ball of pure darkness with two malevolent, glowing red eyes, that drains the life force of anything it touches.

Consume Light(Active, Costs 2 MP) Creates a 3-square radius of magical darkness for 2 rounds.
Life Drain(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a melee attack. On 1-8, it fails. On 9-15, it deals MD necrotic damage and heals for half the amount. On 16+, it deals MD necrotic damage and heals for the full amount.

name: Sentry Turret
description:
A stationary, armored turret that unfolds from a metallic box, its single red optic scanning for targets to pepper with high-velocity projectiles.

Lock On(Active) The Sentry Turret targets one character. All further attacks against this character have advantage until a different target is chosen.
Suppressing Fire(Active, Costs 1 HP) Ranged attack (10 squares) that deals HD damage.

name: Knight-Errant
description:
A young, idealistic warrior in shining steel armor, wielding a longsword and shield with formal, trained movements.

Challenge(Active, Costs 2 SP) The Knight targets a character. The player must Defy Danger (WIS). On 1-8: The character is Taunted for 2 rounds. On 9-15: The character is Taunted for 1 round. On 16+: The character ignores the challenge.
Shield Block(Active) Gains +2 Armor until its next turn.

name: Grave Imp
description:
A twisted, skeletal imp with tattered wings and a cruel grin, that delights in animating the recently deceased for a final, mocking battle.

Raise Ghoul(Active, Costs 3 MP) Make a roll to raise a recently defeated biological creature as a Ghoul. On 1-8: The spell fails. On 9-15: It raises a Ghoul with 5 HP that lasts for 1 round. On 16+: It raises a Ghoul with 10 HP that lasts for 2 rounds.

name: Solar Cleric
description:
A priest in golden-trimmed white robes, whose holy symbol shines with the brilliance of the sun, healing allies and searing foes.

Flash Heal(Active, Costs 2 MP) Heals one ally within 6 squares for MD.
Smite(Active, Costs 1 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (7 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals MD holy damage. On 16+: It deals MD holy damage and the target is Weakened for 1 round.

name: Psychic Penguin
description:
A bipedal penguin-like creature with sleek blue and white feathers and a perpetually confused expression, that waddles slowly and holds its flippers to its head as if fighting a constant migraine.

Headache(Passive) At the start of this creature's turn, roll a d6. On a 1, it is Stunned for 1 round.
Psybeam(Active, Costs 2 SP) Ranged attack (6 squares) that deals SD damage.

name: Wyvern Monarch
description:
A colossal, fire-breathing dragon with a crown of jagged horns and scales the color of molten gold, whose roar echoes for miles.

Boss Creature

Draw 1 random Red and 1 random Orange Feature card and attach them.

Dragon's Breath(Active, Costs 3 MP) Deals x2MD fire damage to all characters in a 6-square cone.
Tail Sweep(Active, Costs 2 HP) All adjacent characters must Defy Danger (DEX) or be knocked prone and take HD damage.

name: Steel Shell Beetle
description:
A massive beetle with a sleek, chrome-plated carapace and two enormous, pincer-like horns that it uses to crush its enemies.

Horn Crush(Active, Costs 2 HP) The Beetle attacks a target. The player must Defy Danger (STR). On 1-8: The target takes x2HD damage. On 9-15: The target takes HD damage. On 16+: The character avoids the attack.
Iron Skin(Passive) Cannot be critically hit by HD attacks.

name: Canine Flame
description:
A lean, orange-furred hound with black stripes along its back that moves with incredible speed, its paws leaving scorched prints on the ground.

Flame Charge(Active, Costs 1 HP) The canine moves up to its speed in a straight line and attacks the first enemy in its path for HD fire damage.
Bite(Active) A standard melee attack dealing HD damage.

name: Dream Eater Spirit
description:
A bizarre, tapir-like creature with pink and yellow fur that floats through the air, consuming the dreams of sleeping creatures.

Consume Dream(Active, Costs 2 SP) If a target is Stunned, this creature can use this ability to deal SD damage and heal for the same amount.
Hypnosis(Active, Costs 2 SP) A target within 4 squares must Defy Danger (WIS) or become Stunned for 1 round.

name: Sky Tyrant
description:
A massive, bipedal reptilian beast with a crown of horns, two undersized arms, and vast, leathery wings that block out the sun.

Boss Creature - Draw 1 random Red, 1 random Black and 1 random orange feature card and attach to this creature.

Hyper Beam(Active, Costs 4 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (10 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals x2MD damage. On 16+: It deals x3MD damage. The Sky Tyrant is Stunned for its next turn.
Wing Attack(Active, Costs 1 HP) Melee attack dealing HD damage to all adjacent enemies.

name: Chitin Soldier
description:
A large, green, praying mantis-like creature that stands upright, its forelimbs forming two enormous, razor-sharp scythes.

Agility(Active) The Chitin Soldier may use a second Move action on its turn.
Slash(Active, Costs 1 HP) A standard melee attack that deals HD damage.

name: Coral Guardian
description:
A stout, bipedal creature whose pink, rocky body is covered in sharp coral growths and whose back is protected by a massive, spiral conch shell.

Spike Cannon(Active, Costs 1 HP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (6 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals HD damage. On 16+: It makes two attacks, each dealing HD damage.
Withdraw(Active) Gains +2 Armor until its next turn, but cannot attack.

name: Glade Panther
description:
A large, muscular feline with a sleek, dark green coat, whose back sprouts a large, closed flower bud that blooms when it attacks.

Seed Bomb(Active, Costs 2 MP) Make a roll for a ranged attack (5 squares). On 1-8: The attack misses. On 9-15: It deals MD damage. On 16+: It deals MD damage in a 2-square radius.

name: Psychic Duck
description:
A blue, bipedal duck-like creature that constantly clutches its head with its stubby wings as if suffering from a crippling migraine.

Confusion(Active, Costs 2 SP) Make a roll to target a character within 6 squares. On 1-8: The power fails. On 9-15: The target is Confused for 1 round. On 16+: The target is Confused for 2 rounds.
Headache(Passive) At the start of its turn, roll a d6. On a 1, this creature takes 1d4 SD and is Stunned for 1 round.

name: Living Magnet
description:
A floating, metallic sphere with a single large eye, flanked by two powerful horseshoe magnets that hum with electrical energy.

Sonic Boom(Active, Costs 1 MP) Ranged attack (7 squares) that deals MD damage that ignores Armor.
Magnet Pull(Passive) Any character wearing metal armor cannot willingly move away from this creature.

name: Primal Larva
description:
A large, docile caterpillar with green skin, a yellow underbelly, and a prominent red, horn-like antenna on its head.

String Shot(Active, Costs 1 HP) A target within 4 squares must Defy Danger (DEX). On 1-8: The target is Immobilized for 1 round. On 9-15: The target is Slowed for 2 rounds. On 16+: The character avoids the string.
Tackle(Active) A standard melee attack dealing HD damage.
